## ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸

Hugoã®ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ«ã¯ã€ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã€ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã€Taxonomyãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªé …ç›®ã‚’ã‚«ãƒãƒ¼ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ«ã«ã¤ã„ã¦è¦šãˆã¦ãŠãã¹ãé‡è¦ãªã“ã¨ã¯ã€ã“ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«åã¯ **`_index.md`** ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã§ã™ã€‚

Congoã¯ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’å°Šé‡ã—ã€ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆè¨­å®šã‚’ä¸Šæ›¸ãã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ä¾‹ãˆã°ã€ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§ `title` ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã‚’ä¸Šæ›¸ãã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

### ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸

|              |                      |
| ------------ | -------------------- |
| **Layout:**  | `layouts/index.html` |
| **Content:** | `content/_index.md`  |

Congoã®ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯ã€ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆè¨­å®šãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦åŒ…æ‹¬çš„ãªãƒ‡ã‚¶ã‚¤ãƒ³ãŒåˆ¶å¾¡ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã¨ã„ã†ç‚¹ã§ç‰¹åˆ¥ã§ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯[ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆ]({{< ref "homepage-layout" >}})ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã§è©³ã—ãèª¬æ˜ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã“ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ãŸã„å ´åˆã¯ã€ `content/_index.md` ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã™ã€‚ã“ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«ã‚ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã¯ã™ã¹ã¦ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«å«ã¾ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

**ä¾‹:**

```yaml
---
title: "Congoã¸ã‚ˆã†ã“ãï¼"
description: "ã“ã‚Œã¯ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã™ã‚‹ãƒ‡ãƒ¢ã§ã™"
---
ç§ã®ã‚¦ã‚§ãƒ–ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã¸ã‚ˆã†ã“ãï¼ç«‹ã¡å¯„ã£ã¦ãã‚Œã¦æœ¬å½“ã«å¬‰ã—ã„ã§ã™ã€‚
```

_ã“ã®ä¾‹ã§ã¯ã€ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«ã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã€ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸æœ¬æ–‡ã«ã„ãã¤ã‹ã®è¿½åŠ ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã€ç”»åƒã€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã‚’å«ã‚ã€ã©ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªMarkdownãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒƒãƒˆã®ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã§ã‚‚æ§‹ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚_

### ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸

|              |                              |
| ------------ | ---------------------------- |
| **Layout:**  | `layouts/_default/list.html` |
| **Content:** | `content/../_index.md`       |

ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯ã€ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³å†…ã®ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ã‚°ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ—åŒ–ã—ã€è¨ªå•è€…ãŒå„ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«åˆ°é”ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®æ–¹æ³•ã‚’æä¾›ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚„ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒªã‚ªã¯ã€è¨˜äº‹ã‚„ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’ã‚°ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ—åŒ–ã—ãŸãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ä¾‹ã§ã™ã€‚

ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ä½œæˆã¯ã€ `content` å†…ã«ã‚µãƒ–ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ã®ã¨åŒã˜ãã‚‰ã„ç°¡å˜ã§ã™ã€‚ä¾‹ãˆã°ã€"Projects"ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ã€ `content/projects/` ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ãã—ã¦ã€ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã”ã¨ã«Markdownãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã§ã¯ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãŒç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ãŒã€ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ã€ã“ã®æ–°ã—ã„ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã«`_index.md`ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚‚ä½œæˆã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
    â””â”€â”€ projects
        â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md          # /projects
        â”œâ”€â”€ first-project.md   # /projects/first-project
        â””â”€â”€ another-project
            â”œâ”€â”€ index.md       # /projects/another-project
            â””â”€â”€ project.jpg
```

Hugoã¯ã€ `content/projects` å†…ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®URLã‚’é©å®œç”Ÿæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ãƒ›ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¨åŒã˜ã‚ˆã†ã«ã€ `_index.md` ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã¯ç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ‡ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ã«å‡ºåŠ›ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚Congoã¯ã“ã®ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

**ä¾‹:**

```yaml
---
title: "Projects"
description: "ç§ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã«ã¤ã„ã¦"
cascade:
  showReadingTime: false
---
ã“ã®ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã«ã¯ã€ç§ãŒç¾åœ¨å–ã‚Šçµ„ã‚“ã§ã„ã‚‹ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆãŒå«ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
```

_ã“ã®ä¾‹ã§ã¯ã€ç‰¹åˆ¥ãª `cascade` ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ã€ã“ã®ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³å†…ã®ã‚µãƒ–ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®èª­æ›¸æ™‚é–“ã‚’éè¡¨ç¤ºã«ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã†ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã€ã©ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§ã‚‚èª­æ›¸æ™‚é–“ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œãªããªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã¯ã€å€‹ã€…ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã®ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’å«ã‚ãªãã¦ã‚‚ã€ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³å…¨ä½“ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã®ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’ä¸Šæ›¸ãã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã‚‹ç´ æ™´ã‚‰ã—ã„æ–¹æ³•ã§ã™ã€‚_

ã“ã®ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã®[ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«]({{< ref "samples" >}})ã¯ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ä¸€ä¾‹ã§ã™ã€‚

### Taxonomyãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸

|                  |                                  |
| ---------------- | -------------------------------- |
| **List layout:** | `layouts/_default/taxonomy.html` |
| **Term layout:** | `layouts/_default/term.html`     |
| **Content:**     | `content/../_index.md`           |

Taxonomyãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ã¯ã€Taxonomyã®ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã¨Taxonomyã®Termã¨ã„ã†2ã¤ã®å½¢å¼ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã¯Taxonomyå†…ã®å„Termã®ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã—ã€Termã¯æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸTermã«é–¢é€£ã™ã‚‹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

Termã¯å°‘ã—æ··ä¹±ã—ã‚„ã™ã„ã®ã§ã€`animals` ã¨ã„ã†Taxonomyã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ä¾‹ã‚’æ¢ã£ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

ã¾ãšã€Hugoã§Taxonomyã‚’ä½¿ã†ã«ã¯è¨­å®šãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã™ã€‚ `config/_default/taxonomies.toml` ã«è¨­å®šãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã€Taxonomyã®åå‰ã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

```toml

animal = "animals"
```

Hugoã¯Taxonomyã‚’å˜æ•°å½¢ã¨è¤‡æ•°å½¢ã§ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’æƒ³å®šã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€å˜æ•°å½¢ã® `animal` ã¨è¤‡æ•°å½¢ã® `animals` ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¦ã€ä¾‹ã®Taxonomyã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã“ã‚Œã§ `animals` TaxonomyãŒå­˜åœ¨ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ãªã£ãŸã®ã§ã€å€‹ã€…ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã«è¿½åŠ ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒã‚¿ãƒ¼ã«æŒ¿å…¥ã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã™:

```yaml
---
title: "ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚ªãƒ³ã®å·£ã¸"
description: "ä»Šé€±ã¯ãƒ©ã‚¤ã‚ªãƒ³ã«ã¤ã„ã¦å­¦ã³ã¾ã™"

---
```

ã“ã‚Œã§ `animals` Taxonomyã®ä¸­ã« `lion` ã¨ `cat` ã¨ã„ã†TermãŒã§ããŸã“ã¨ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

ã“ã®æ™‚ç‚¹ã§ã¯æ˜ã‚‰ã‹ã§ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€Hugoã¯ã“ã®æ–°ã—ã„Taxonomyãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã¨Termã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã§ã¯ã€ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã¯ `/animals/` ã«ã€Termãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯ `/animals/lion/` ã¨ `/animals/cat/` ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯Taxonomyã«å«ã¾ã‚Œã‚‹ã™ã¹ã¦ã®Termã‚’ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®ä¾‹ã§ã¯ã€ `/animals/` ã«ç§»å‹•ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€ `lion` ã¨ `cat` ã®ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ãŒã‚ã‚‹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã€è¨ªå•è€…ã¯ãã‚Œãã‚Œã®Termãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ç§»å‹•ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

Termãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯ãã®TermãŒå«ã¾ã‚Œã‚‹ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®Termãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã¯åŸºæœ¬çš„ã«é€šå¸¸ã®[ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸](#ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸)ã¨ã»ã¨ã‚“ã©åŒã˜ã‚ˆã†ã«å‹•ä½œã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

Taxonomyãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ã€Taxonomyåã‚’ã‚µãƒ–ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã¨ã—ã¦ã€ `content` å†…ã« `_index.md` ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã™ã€‚

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
    â””â”€â”€ animals
        â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md       # /animals
        â””â”€â”€ lion
            â””â”€â”€ _index.md   # /animals/lion
```

ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«ã‚ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã¯ç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚ŒãŸTaxonomyãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«é…ç½®ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ä»–ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã¨åŒã˜ã‚ˆã†ã«ã€ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒã‚¿ãƒ¼ã¯ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã‚’ä¸Šæ›¸ãã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ä½¿ã†ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ã€ `lion` ã¨ã„ã†åå‰ã®ã‚¿ã‚°ãŒã‚ã£ã¦ã‚‚ã€ `title` ã‚’"Lion"ã«ä¸Šæ›¸ãã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

ã“ã‚ŒãŒå®Ÿéš›ã«ã©ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«è¦‹ãˆã‚‹ã‹ã¯ã€ã“ã®ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã®[Tags]({{< ref "tags" >}})ã‚’ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

## ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ•ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸

| ------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| **Layout:**               | `layouts/_default/single.html`  |
| **Content (standalone):** | `content/../page-name.md`       |
| **Content (bundled):**    | `content/../page-name/index.md` |

Hugoã®ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ•ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯åŸºæœ¬çš„ã«æ¨™æº–çš„ãªã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§ã™ã€‚ã‚µãƒ–ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’å«ã¾ãªã„ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¨ã—ã¦å®šç¾©ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ä¾‹ãˆã°ã€ã‚¢ãƒã‚¦ãƒˆãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚„ã€ã‚¦ã‚§ãƒ–ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã®ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã«ã‚ã‚‹å€‹ã€…ã®ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°è¨˜äº‹ãªã©ã§ã™ã€‚

ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ•ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ã¤ã„ã¦è¦šãˆã¦ãŠãã¹ãæœ€ã‚‚é‡è¦ãªã“ã¨ã¯ã€ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¨ã¯ç•°ãªã‚Šã€ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ•ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯ã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚³ã‚¢ãªã—ã§ `index.md` ã¨åå‰ã‚’ã¤ã‘ã‚‹ã¹ãã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã§ã™ã€‚ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ•ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯ã¾ãŸã€ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ãƒˆãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ™ãƒ«ã«ã¾ã¨ã‚ã¦ä¸€æ„ãªåå‰ã‚’ã¤ã‘ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã‚‹ã¨ã„ã†ç‚¹ã§ç‰¹åˆ¥ã§ã™ã€‚

```shell

    â””â”€â”€ blog

        â””â”€â”€ third-post

ç”»åƒãªã©ã‚’ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«å«ã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã€ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ«ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ«ã¯ `index.md` ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’å«ã‚€ã‚µãƒ–ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚„ãã®ä»–ã®ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ã®å¤šãã¯ã€ãƒªã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ãŒãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¨ä¸€ç·’ã«ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ«ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’å‰æã¨ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã¨ä¸€ç·’ã«ç‹¬è‡ªã®ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã«ã‚°ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ—åŒ–ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒé‡è¦ã§ã™ã€‚

**ä¾‹:**

```yaml
---
title: "åˆã‚ã¦ã®ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°æŠ•ç¨¿"

_ã“ã‚Œ_ ãŒç§ã®ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°è¨˜äº‹ã®å†…å®¹ã§ã™ã€‚

ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ•ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ã¯æ§˜ã€…ãª[ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒã‚¿ãƒ¼]({{< ref "front-matter" >}})ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãŒã‚ã‚Šã€ãã‚Œã‚‰ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦è¡¨ç¤ºæ–¹æ³•ã‚’ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

### å¤–éƒ¨ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯

Congoã«ã¯ã€å¤–éƒ¨ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¸ã®ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã‚’è¨˜äº‹ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã«è¡¨ç¤ºã§ãã‚‹ç‰¹åˆ¥ãªæ©Ÿèƒ½ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã¯ã€Mediumã®ã‚ˆã†ãªã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ã®ã‚¦ã‚§ãƒ–ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã‚„ç ”ç©¶è«–æ–‡ã«ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ãŒã‚ã‚Šã€Hugoã®ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã«ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’è¤‡è£½ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãªããƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã‚’å¼µã‚ŠãŸã„å ´åˆã«ä¾¿åˆ©ã§ã™ã€‚

å¤–éƒ¨ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯è¨˜äº‹ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ã€ç‰¹åˆ¥ãªãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™:

```yaml
---
title: "ç§ã®Mediumã®è¨˜äº‹"
date: 2022-01-25
externalUrl: "https://medium.com/"
summary: "ç§ã¯Mediumã«è¨˜äº‹ã‚’æ›¸ãã¾ã—ãŸã€‚"
showReadingTime: false
_build:
  render: "false"
  list: "local"
---
```

`title` ã‚„ `summary` ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªé€šå¸¸ã®ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã¨ã¨ã‚‚ã«ã€ `externalUrl` ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã¯ã“ã®è¨˜äº‹ãŒæ™®é€šã®è¨˜äº‹ã§ã¯ãªã„ã“ã¨ã‚’ä¼ãˆã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ä½¿ã‚ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã“ã§æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸURLã¯ã€è¨ªå•è€…ãŒã“ã®è¨˜äº‹ã‚’é¸æŠã—ãŸã¨ãã«èª˜å°ã•ã‚Œã‚‹å ´æ‰€ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

ã•ã‚‰ã«ã€ã“ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã®é€šå¸¸ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãŒç”Ÿæˆã•ã‚Œãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã«ï¼ˆå¤–éƒ¨URLã«ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã™ã‚‹æ„å‘³ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ï¼ï¼‰ã€Hugoã®ç‰¹åˆ¥ãªãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã§ã‚ã‚‹ `_build` ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã«ã¯ã€ã“ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªå¤–éƒ¨ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯è¨˜äº‹ã‚’ç°¡å˜ã«ç”Ÿæˆã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã®ã‚¢ãƒ¼ã‚­ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ãŒå«ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚æ–°ã—ã„ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’ä½œã‚‹ã¨ãã« `-k external` ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã™ã€‚

```shell

```

### ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸

|                   |                                |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------ |
| **Layout:**       | `layouts/_default/simple.html` |
| **Front Matter:** | `layout: "simple"`             |

Congoã«ã¯ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãªãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ãŸã‚ã®ç‰¹åˆ¥ãªãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã‚‚å«ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãƒ»ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã¯å…¨å¹…ã®ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã§ã€ç‰¹åˆ¥ãªãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒæ©Ÿèƒ½ãªã—ã«Markdownã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«é…ç½®ã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã™ã€‚

ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã§åˆ©ç”¨ã§ãã‚‹å”¯ä¸€ã®æ©Ÿèƒ½ã¯ãƒ‘ãƒ³ããšãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã¨å…±æœ‰ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã§ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®å‹•ä½œã¯é€šå¸¸ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¨åŒæ§˜ã«[ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒã‚¿ãƒ¼]({{< ref "front-matter" >}})ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦åˆ¶å¾¡ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

ç‰¹å®šã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã‚’æœ‰åŠ¹ã«ã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ã€ `layout` ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒã‚¿ãƒ¼å¤‰æ•°ã« `"simple"` ã¨ã„ã†å€¤ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¾ã™:

```yaml
---

ã“ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã¯å…¨å¹…ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚
```

## ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆ

Hugoã®åˆ©ç‚¹ã®ã²ã¨ã¤ã¯ã€ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆå…¨ä½“ã‚„å€‹ã€…ã®ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã€ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã‚’ç°¡å˜ã«ä½œæˆã§ãã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã™ã€‚

ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã¯é€šå¸¸ã®Hugoã®ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆè¦å‰‡ã«å¾“ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚è©³ç´°ã¯[Hugoå…¬å¼ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆ](https://gohugo.io/templates/introduction/)ã‚’ã”è¦§ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

### ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã®ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ‰

ä¸Šã§èª¬æ˜ã—ãŸå„ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ã«ã¯ã€å„ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ä½¿ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒè¨˜è¼‰ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã«ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’ä¸Šæ›¸ãã™ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€ã‚¦ã‚§ãƒ–ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã®ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

ä¾‹ãˆã°ã€ `layouts/_default/single.html` ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚Œã°ã€ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ•ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã‚’å®Œå…¨ã«ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

### ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆ

ã¾ãŸã€å€‹ã€…ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ã®ã‚‚ç°¡å˜ã§ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã¯ã€ç‰¹å®šã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’ç‰¹å®šã®ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«ã§ä¸€è¦§è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’ä½œã‚ŠãŸã„å ´åˆã«ä¾¿åˆ©ã§ã™ã€‚

ç‰¹æ®Šãªãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã§ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’ä¸€è¦§è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ã€ŒProjectsã€ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ä¾‹ã‚’è¦‹ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

ã“ã‚Œã‚’è¡Œã†ã«ã¯ã€é€šå¸¸ã®Hugoã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’æ§‹æˆã—ã€ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆç”¨ã®ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã•ã‚‰ã«ã€ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã¨åŒã˜ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªåã‚’ä½¿ã„ã€ `list.html` ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ã¦ã€ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ç”¨ã®æ–°ã—ã„ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ projects
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ first-project.md
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ second-project.md
â””â”€â”€ layouts
    â””â”€â”€ projects
        â””â”€â”€ list.html
```

ã“ã® `list.html` ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã¯ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã®ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ‰ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’è¦‹ã‚‹å‰ã«ã€ã¾ãšå€‹ã€…ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’è¦‹ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

```yaml
---
title: "Congo"
date: 2021-08-11
icon: "github"
description: "Tailwind CSSã§ä½œã‚‰ã‚ŒãŸHugoã®ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒ"
topics: ["Hugo", "Web", "Tailwind"]
externalUrl: "https://github.com/jpanther/congo/"
---
```

_ã“ã®ä¾‹ã§ã¯ã€å„ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã«ãƒ¡ã‚¿ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å‰²ã‚Šå½“ã¦ã€ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã§ä½¿ç”¨ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€ãã‚Œã‚’å«ã‚ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’å¦¨ã’ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã‚‚ä½•ã‚‚ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ã‚ãªãŸã®ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆãªã®ã§ã™ã‹ã‚‰ï¼_

ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆãŒå®šç¾©ã•ã‚ŒãŸã®ã§ã€å„ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã®è©³ç´°ã‚’å‡ºåŠ›ã™ã‚‹ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

```go
{{ define "main" }}
  <section class="mt-8">
    {{ range .Pages }}
      <article class="pb-6">
        <a class="flex" href="{{ .Params.externalUrl }}">
          <div class="mr-3 text-3xl text-neutral-300">
            <span class="relative inline-block align-text-bottom">
              {{ partial "icon.html" .Params.icon }}
            </span>
          </div>
          <div>
            <h3 class="flex text-xl font-semibold">
              {{ .Title }}
            </h3>
            <p class="text-sm text-neutral-400">
              {{ .Description }}
            </p>
          </div>
        </a>
      </article>
    {{ end }}
  </section>
{{ end }}
```

ã“ã‚Œã¯éå¸¸ã«ã‚ã‹ã‚Šã‚„ã™ã„ä¾‹ã§ã™ãŒã€ã“ã®ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®å„ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ï¼ˆã¤ã¾ã‚Šå„ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆï¼‰ã‚’é †ã«è¦‹ã¦ã„ãã€å„ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã¸ã®HTMLãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã‚’ã‚¢ã‚¤ã‚³ãƒ³ã¨ä¸€ç·’ã«å‡ºåŠ›ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‹ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚å„ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã®ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒã‚¿ãƒ¼ã®ãƒ¡ã‚¿ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã¯ã€ã©ã®æƒ…å ±ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹ã‹ã‚’æ±ºå®šã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ä½¿ã‚ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

é–¢é€£ã™ã‚‹ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«ã¨ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ãŒåˆ©ç”¨å¯èƒ½ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèªã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã€Tailwind CSSã‚’å†ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ‘ã‚¤ãƒ«ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œãªã„ã“ã¨ã‚’è¦šãˆã¦ãŠã„ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯ã€[é«˜åº¦ãªã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚º]({{< ref "advanced-customisation" >}})ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã§è©³ã—ãèª¬æ˜ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ã“ã®ã‚ˆã†ãªã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã€ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã®Congoãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆãŒã©ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«å‹•ä½œã™ã‚‹ã‹ã‚’è¦‹ã¦ã€ãã‚Œã‚’ã‚¬ã‚¤ãƒ‰ã¨ã—ã¦ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã®ãŒæœ€ã‚‚ç°¡å˜ã§ã™ã€‚[Hugo docs](https://gohugo.io/templates/introduction/)ã¯ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã®ä½œæˆã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã‚‚ã£ã¨å­¦ã¶ãŸã‚ã®ç´ æ™´ã‚‰ã—ã„ãƒªã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚

==================================================

### FILE: themes/congo/exampleSite/content/docs/content-examples/index.md
--------------------------------------------------
---
title: "Content Examples"
date: 2020-08-09
draft: false
description: "Some examples that demonstrate how content should be created and structured."
summary: "It's time to bring everything together with some examples that demonstrate how content should be created and structured."
slug: "content-examples"
tags: ["content", "example"]
---

If you've been reading the documentation in order, you should now know about all the features and configurations available in Congo. This page is designed to pull everything together and offer some worked examples that you might like to use in your Hugo project.

{{< alert >}}
**Tip:** If you're new to Hugo, be sure to check out the [official docs](https://gohugo.io/content-management/page-bundles/) to learn more about the concept of page bundles and resources.
{{< /alert >}}

The examples on this page can all be adapted to different scenarios but hopefully give you some ideas about how to approach formatting a particular content item for your individual project.

## Branch pages

Branch page bundles in Hugo cover items like the homepage, section listings, and taxonomy pages. The important thing to remember about branch bundles is that the filename for this content type is **`_index.md`**.

Congo will honour the front matter parameters specified in branch pages and these will override the default settings for that particular page. For example, setting the `title` parameter in a branch page will allow overriding the page title.

### Homepage

|              |                      |
| ------------ | -------------------- |
| **Layout:**  | `layouts/index.html` |
| **Content:** | `content/_index.md`  |

The homepage in Congo is special in that it's overarching design is controlled by the homepage layout config parameter. You can learn more about this in the [Homepage Layout]({{< ref "homepage-layout" >}}) section.

If you want to add custom content to this page, you simply need to create a `content/_index.md` file. Anything in this file will then be included in your homepage.

**Example:**

```yaml
---
title: "Welcome to Congo!"
description: "This is a demo of adding content to the homepage."
---
Welcome to my website! I'm really happy you stopped by.
```

_This example sets a custom title and adds some additional text to the body of the page. Any Markdown formatted text is acceptable, including shortcodes, images and links._

### List pages

|              |                              |
| ------------ | ---------------------------- |
| **Layout:**  | `layouts/_default/list.html` |
| **Content:** | `content/../_index.md`       |

List pages group all the pages within into a section and provide a way for visitors to reach each page. A blog or portfolio are examples of a list page as they group together posts or projects.

Creating a list page is as simple as making a sub-directory in the content folder. For example, to create a "Projects" section, you would create `content/projects/`. Then create a Markdown file for each of your projects.

A list page will be generated by default, however to customise the content, you should also create an `_index.md` page in this new directory.

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
    â””â”€â”€ projects
        â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md          # /projects
        â”œâ”€â”€ first-project.md   # /projects/first-project
        â””â”€â”€ another-project
            â”œâ”€â”€ index.md       # /projects/another-project
            â””â”€â”€ project.jpg
```

Hugo will generate URLs for the pages in your projects folder accordingly.

Just like the homepage, content in the `_index.md` file will be output into the generated list index. Congo will then list any pages in this section below the content.

**Example:**

```yaml
---
title: "Projects"
description: "Learn about some of my projects."
cascade:
  showReadingTime: false
---
This section contains all my current projects.
```

_In this example, the special `cascade` parameter is being used to hide the reading time on any sub-pages within this section. By doing this, any project pages will not have their reading time showing. This is a great way to override default theme parameters for an entire section without having to include them in every individual page._

The [samples section]({{< ref "samples" >}}) of this site is an example of a list page.

### Taxonomy pages

|                  |                                  |
| ---------------- | -------------------------------- |
| **List layout:** | `layouts/_default/taxonomy.html` |
| **Term layout:** | `layouts/_default/term.html`     |
| **Content:**     | `content/../_index.md`           |

Taxonomy pages come in two forms - taxonomy lists and taxonomy terms. Lists display a listing of each of the terms within a given taxonomy, while terms display a list of pages that are related to a given term.

The terminology can get a little confusing so let's explore an example using a taxonomy named `animals`.

Firstly, to use taxonomies in Hugo, they have to be configured. This is done by creating a config file at `config/_default/taxonomies.toml` and defining the taxonomy name.

```toml
# config/_default/taxonomies.toml

animal = "animals"
```

Hugo expects taxonomies to be listed using their singular and plural forms, so we add the singular `animal` equals the plural `animals` to create our example taxonomy.

Now that our `animals` taxonomy exists, it needs to be added to individual content items. It's as simple as inserting it into the front matter:

```yaml
---
title: "Into the Lion's Den"
description: "This week we're learning about lions."
animals: ["lion", "cat"]
---
```

This has now created two _terms_ within our `animals` taxonomy - `lion` and `cat`.

Although it's not obvious at this point, Hugo will now be generating list and term pages for this new taxonomy. By default the listing can be accessed at `/animals/` and the term pages can be found at `/animals/lion/` and `/animals/cat/`.

The list page will list all the terms contained within the taxonomy. In this example, navigating to `/animals/` will show a page that has links for "lion" and "cat" which take visitors to the individual term pages.

The term pages will list all the pages contained within that term. These term lists are essentially the same as normal [list pages](#list-pages) and behave in much the same way.

In order to add custom content to taxonomy pages, simply create `_index.md` files in the content folder using the taxonomy name as the sub-directory name.

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
    â””â”€â”€ animals
        â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md       # /animals
        â””â”€â”€ lion
            â””â”€â”€ _index.md   # /animals/lion
```

Anything in these content files will now be placed onto the generated taxonomy pages. As with other content, the front matter variables can be used to override defaults. In this way you could have a tag named `lion` but override the `title` to be "Lion".

To see how this looks in reality, check out the [tags taxonomy listing]({{< ref "tags" >}}) on this site.

## Leaf pages

|                           |                                 |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| **Layout:**               | `layouts/_default/single.html`  |
| **Content (standalone):** | `content/../page-name.md`       |
| **Content (bundled):**    | `content/../page-name/index.md` |

Leaf pages in Hugo are basically standard content pages. They are defined as pages that don't contain any sub-pages. These could be things like an about page, or an individual blog post that lives in the blog section of the website.

The most important thing to remember about leaf pages is that unlike branch pages, leaf pages should be named `index.md` _without_ an underscore. Leaf pages are also special in that they can be grouped together at the top level of the section and named with a unique name.

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
    â””â”€â”€ blog
        â”œâ”€â”€ first-post.md     # /blog/first-post
        â”œâ”€â”€ second-post.md    # /blog/second-post
        â””â”€â”€ third-post
            â”œâ”€â”€ index.md      # /blog/third-post
            â””â”€â”€ image.jpg
```

When including assets in a page, like an image, a page bundle should be used. Page bundles are created using a sub-directory with an `index.md` file. Grouping the assets with the content in its own directory is important as many of the shortcodes and other theme logic assumes that resources are bundled alongside pages.

**Example:**

```yaml
---
title: "My First Blog Post"
date: 2022-01-25
description: "Welcome to my blog!"
summary: "Learn more about me and why I am starting this blog."
tags: ["welcome", "new", "about", "first"]
---
_This_ is the content of my blog post.
```

Leaf pages have a wide variety of [front matter]({{< ref "front-matter" >}}) parameters that can be used to customise how they are displayed.

### External links

Congo has a special feature that allows links to external pages to appear alongside articles in the article listings. This is useful if you have content on third party websites like Medium, or research papers that you'd like to link to, without replicating the content in your Hugo site.

In order to create an external link article, some special front matter needs to be set:

```yaml
---
title: "My Medium post"
date: 2022-01-25
externalUrl: "https://medium.com/"
summary: "I wrote a post on Medium."
showReadingTime: false
_build:
  render: "false"
  list: "local"
---
```

Along with the normal front matter parameters like `title` and `summary`, the `externalUrl` parameter is used to tell Congo that this is not an ordinary article. The URL provided here will be where visitors are directed when they select this article.

Additionally, we use a special Hugo front matter parameter `_build` to prevent a normal page for this content being generated - there's no point generating a page since we're linking to an external URL!

The theme includes an archetype to make generating these external link articles simple. Just specify `-k external` when making new content.

```shell
hugo new -k external posts/my-post.md
```

### Simple pages

|                   |                                |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------ |
| **Layout:**       | `layouts/_default/simple.html` |
| **Front Matter:** | `layout: "simple"`             |

Congo also includes a special layout for simple pages. The simple layout is a full-width template that just places Markdown content into the page without any special theme features.

The only features available in the simple layout are breadcrumbs and sharing links. However, the behaviour of these can still be controlled using the normal page [front matter]({{< ref "front-matter" >}}) variables.

To enable the simple layout on a particular page, add the `layout` front matter variable with a value of `"simple"`:

```yaml
---
title: "My landing page"
date: 2022-03-08
layout: "simple"
---
This page content is now full-width.
```

## Custom layouts

One of the benefits of Hugo is that it makes it easy to create custom layouts for the whole site, individual sections or pages.

Layouts follow all the normal Hugo templating rules and more information is available in the [official Hugo docs](https://gohugo.io/templates/introduction/).

### Overriding default layouts

Each of the content types discussed above lists the layout file that is used to generate each type of page. If this file is created in your local project it will override the theme template and thus can be used to customise the default style of the website.

For example, creating a `layouts/_default/single.html` file will allow the layout of leaf pages to be completely customised.

### Custom section layouts

It is also simple to create custom layouts for individual content sections. This is useful when you want to make a section that lists a certain type of content using a particular style.

Let's step through an example that creates a custom "Projects" page that lists projects using a special layout.

In order to do this, structure your content using the normal Hugo content rules and create a section for your projects. Additionally, create a new layout for the projects section by using the same directory name as the content and adding a `list.html` file.

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ projects
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ first-project.md
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ second-project.md
â””â”€â”€ layouts
    â””â”€â”€ projects
        â””â”€â”€ list.html
```

This `list.html` file will now override the default list template, but only for the `projects` section. Before we look at this file, lets first look at the individual project files.

```yaml
---
title: "Congo"
date: 2021-08-11
icon: "github"
description: "A theme for Hugo built with Tailwind CSS."
topics: ["Hugo", "Web", "Tailwind"]
externalUrl: "https://github.com/jpanther/congo/"
---
```

_In this example we are assigning some metadata for each project that we can then use in our list template. There's no page content, but there's nothing stopping you from including it. It's your own custom template after all!_

With the projects defined, now we can create a list template that outputs the details of each project.

```go
{{ define "main" }}
  <section class="mt-8">
    {{ range .Pages }}
      <article class="pb-6">
        <a class="flex" href="{{ .Params.externalUrl }}">
          <div class="mr-3 text-3xl text-neutral-300">
            <span class="relative inline-block align-text-bottom">
              {{ partial "icon.html" .Params.icon }}
            </span>
          </div>
          <div>
            <h3 class="flex text-xl font-semibold">
              {{ .Title }}
            </h3>
            <p class="text-sm text-neutral-400">
              {{ .Description }}
            </p>
          </div>
        </a>
      </article>
    {{ end }}
  </section>
{{ end }}
```

Although this is quite a straightforward example, you can see that it steps through each of the pages in this section (ie. each project), and then outputs HTML links to each project alongside an icon. The metadata in the front matter for each project is used to determine which information is displayed.

Keep in mind that you'll need to ensure the relevant styles and classes are available, which may require the Tailwind CSS to be recompiled. This is discussed in more detail in the [Advanced Customisation]({{< ref "advanced-customisation" >}}) section.

When making custom templates like this one, it's always easiest to take a look at how the default Congo template works and then use that as a guide. Remember, the [Hugo docs](https://gohugo.io/templates/introduction/) are a great resource to learn more about creating templates too.

==================================================

### FILE: themes/congo/exampleSite/content/docs/content-examples/index.zh-Hans.md

---

summary: "æ˜¯æ—¶å€™é€šè¿‡ä¸€äº›æ¼”ç¤ºç¤ºä¾‹å°†æ‰€æœ‰å†…å®¹æ•´åˆèµ·æ¥ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºå¦‚ä½•åˆ›å»ºå’Œç»„ç»‡å†…å®¹äº†ã€‚"

å¦‚æœä½ æŒ‰é¡ºåºé˜…è¯»æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œç°åœ¨åº”è¯¥å¯¹ Congo ä¸­æä¾›çš„æ‰€æœ‰åŠŸèƒ½å’Œé…ç½®æœ‰æ‰€äº†è§£ã€‚æœ¬é¡µé¢æ—¨åœ¨å°†æ‰€æœ‰å†…å®¹æ•´åˆåœ¨ä¸€èµ·ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›ä¸€äº›ä½ å¯èƒ½æƒ³åœ¨ Hugo é¡¹ç›®ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨çš„å®é™…ç¤ºä¾‹ã€‚

{{< alert >}}
**æç¤ºï¼š** å¦‚æœä½ æ˜¯ Hugo æ–°æ‰‹ï¼Œè¯·åŠ¡å¿…æŸ¥é˜…[å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£](https://gohugo.io/content-management/page-bundles/)ï¼Œäº†è§£æœ‰å…³page bundleså’Œèµ„æºæ¦‚å¿µçš„æ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯ã€‚
{{< /alert >}}

æœ¬é¡µé¢çš„ç¤ºä¾‹å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®ä¸åŒçš„æƒ…å¢ƒè¿›è¡Œè°ƒæ•´ï¼Œä½†å¸Œæœ›èƒ½ä¸ºä½ æä¾›ä¸€äº›å…³äºå¦‚ä½•å¤„ç†ç‰¹å®šå†…å®¹é¡¹æ ¼å¼çš„æ€è·¯ï¼Œä»¥é€‚åº”ä½ ä¸ªäººé¡¹ç›®çš„éœ€è¦ã€‚

## åˆ†æ”¯é¡µé¢

åœ¨ Hugo ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ†æ”¯é¡µé¢åŒ…æ‹¬ä¸»é¡µã€éƒ¨åˆ†åˆ—è¡¨å’Œåˆ†ç±»é¡µé¢ç­‰ã€‚éœ€è¦è®°ä½çš„ä¸€ç‚¹æ˜¯ï¼Œæ­¤ç±»å†…å®¹çš„æ–‡ä»¶åæ˜¯ **`_index.md`**ã€‚

Congo å°†éµå¾ªåˆ†æ”¯é¡µé¢ä¸­æŒ‡å®šçš„ front matter å‚æ•°ï¼Œè¿™äº›å‚æ•°å°†è¦†ç›–è¯¥ç‰¹å®šé¡µé¢çš„é»˜è®¤è®¾ç½®ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œåœ¨åˆ†æ”¯é¡µé¢ä¸­è®¾ç½® `title` å‚æ•°å°†å…è®¸è¦†ç›–é¡µé¢æ ‡é¢˜ã€‚

### ä¸»é¡µ

|              |                      |
| ------------ | -------------------- |
| **å¸ƒå±€ï¼š**   | `layouts/index.html` |
| **å†…å®¹ï¼š**   | `content/_index.md`  |

åœ¨ Congo ä¸­ï¼Œä¸»é¡µæ˜¯ç‰¹æ®Šçš„ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå…¶æ€»ä½“è®¾è®¡ç”±ä¸»é¡µå¸ƒå±€é…ç½®å‚æ•°æ§åˆ¶ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥åœ¨ [ä¸»é¡µå¸ƒå±€]({{< ref "homepage-layout" >}}) éƒ¨åˆ†äº†è§£æ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

å¦‚æœä½ æƒ³åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªé¡µé¢ä¸Šæ·»åŠ è‡ªå®šä¹‰å†…å®¹ï¼Œåªéœ€åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª `content/_index.md` æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚ç„¶åï¼Œæ­¤æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„ä»»ä½•å†…å®¹éƒ½å°†åŒ…å«åœ¨ä½ çš„ä¸»é¡µä¸­ã€‚

**ç¤ºä¾‹:**

```yaml
---
title: "æ¬¢è¿æ¥åˆ° Congoï¼"
description: "è¿™æ˜¯å‘ä¸»é¡µæ·»åŠ å†…å®¹çš„æ¼”ç¤ºã€‚"
---
æ¬¢è¿æ¥åˆ°æˆ‘çš„ç½‘ç«™ï¼æˆ‘çœŸçš„å¾ˆé«˜å…´ä½ åœç•™åœ¨è¿™é‡Œã€‚
```

_æ­¤ç¤ºä¾‹è®¾ç½®äº†è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ ‡é¢˜ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨é¡µé¢æ­£æ–‡ä¸­æ·»åŠ äº†ä¸€äº›é¢å¤–çš„æ–‡æœ¬ã€‚ä»»ä½• Markdown æ ¼å¼çš„æ–‡æœ¬éƒ½æ˜¯å¯ä»¥æ¥å—çš„ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬çŸ­ä»£ç ã€å›¾ç‰‡å’Œé“¾æ¥ã€‚_

### åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢

|              |                              |
| ------------ | ---------------------------- |
| **å¸ƒå±€ï¼š**   | `layouts/_default/list.html` |
| **å†…å®¹ï¼š**   | `content/../_index.md`       |

åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢å°†å…¶å†…éƒ¨çš„æ‰€æœ‰é¡µé¢åˆ†ç»„åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›ä¸€ç§è®©è®¿é—®è€…è®¿é—®æ¯ä¸ªé¡µé¢çš„æ–¹å¼ã€‚åšå®¢æˆ–æŠ•å½±é›†æ˜¯åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå®ƒä»¬å°†å¸–å­æˆ–é¡¹ç›®åˆ†ç»„åœ¨ä¸€èµ·ã€‚

åˆ›å»ºåˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢å°±åƒåœ¨ content æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸­åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå­ç›®å½•ä¸€æ ·ç®€å•ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œè¦åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª "Projects" éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œä½ å°†åˆ›å»º `content/projects/`ã€‚ç„¶åä¸ºä½ çš„æ¯ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª Markdown æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢å°†é»˜è®¤ç”Ÿæˆï¼Œä½†ä¸ºäº†è‡ªå®šä¹‰å†…å®¹ï¼Œä½ è¿˜åº”è¯¥åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªæ–°ç›®å½•ä¸­åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª `_index.md` é¡µé¢ã€‚

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
    â””â”€â”€ projects
        â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md          # /projects
        â”œâ”€â”€ first-project.md   # /projects/first-project
        â””â”€â”€ another-project
            â”œâ”€â”€ index.md       # /projects/another-project
            â””â”€â”€ project.jpg
```

Hugo å°†ç›¸åº”åœ°ä¸ºé¡¹ç›®æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸­çš„é¡µé¢ç”Ÿæˆ URLã€‚

å°±åƒä¸»é¡µä¸€æ ·ï¼Œ`_index.md` æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„å†…å®¹å°†è¾“å‡ºåˆ°ç”Ÿæˆçš„åˆ—è¡¨ç´¢å¼•ä¸­ã€‚Congo ç„¶åä¼šåœ¨å†…å®¹ä¸‹æ–¹åˆ—å‡ºæ­¤éƒ¨åˆ†ä¸­çš„ä»»ä½•é¡µé¢ã€‚

**ç¤ºä¾‹:**

```yaml
---
title: "é¡¹ç›®"
description: "äº†è§£æˆ‘çš„ä¸€äº›é¡¹ç›®ã€‚"
cascade:
  showReadingTime: false
---
è¿™ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†åŒ…å«æ‰€æœ‰æˆ‘çš„å½“å‰é¡¹ç›®ã€‚
```

_åœ¨æ­¤ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨äº†ç‰¹æ®Šçš„ `cascade` å‚æ•°æ¥éšè—æ­¤éƒ¨åˆ†ä¸­ä»»ä½•å­é¡µé¢ä¸Šçš„é˜…è¯»æ—¶é—´ã€‚é€šè¿‡è¿™æ ·åšï¼Œä»»ä½•é¡¹ç›®é¡µé¢å°†ä¸æ˜¾ç¤ºå…¶é˜…è¯»æ—¶é—´ã€‚è¿™æ˜¯åœ¨æ•´ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†ä¸­è¦†ç›–é»˜è®¤ä¸»é¢˜å‚æ•°çš„å¥½æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè€Œæ— éœ€åœ¨æ¯ä¸ªå•ç‹¬é¡µé¢ä¸­åŒ…å«å®ƒä»¬ã€‚_

æ­¤ç«™ç‚¹çš„ [æ ·æœ¬éƒ¨åˆ†]({{< ref "samples" >}}) æ˜¯åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ã€‚

### åˆ†ç±»é¡µé¢

|                  |                                  |
| ---------------- | -------------------------------- |
| **åˆ—è¡¨å¸ƒå±€:**    | `layouts/_default/taxonomy.html` |
| **æœ¯è¯­å¸ƒå±€:**    | `layouts/_default/term.html`     |
| **å†…å®¹:**       | `content/../_index.md`           |

åˆ†ç±»é¡µé¢æœ‰ä¸¤ç§å½¢å¼ - åˆ†ç±»åˆ—è¡¨å’Œåˆ†ç±»æœ¯è¯­ã€‚åˆ—è¡¨æ˜¾ç¤ºç»™å®šåˆ†ç±»ä¸­æ¯ä¸ªæœ¯è¯­çš„åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œè€Œæœ¯è¯­æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸ç»™å®šæœ¯è¯­ç›¸å…³çš„é¡µé¢åˆ—è¡¨ã€‚

æœ¯è¯­å¯èƒ½ä¼šæœ‰ç‚¹æ··æ·†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è®©æˆ‘ä»¬é€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸ªä½¿ç”¨åä¸º `animals` çš„åˆ†ç±»çš„ç¤ºä¾‹æ¥æ¢è®¨ä¸€ä¸‹ã€‚

é¦–å…ˆï¼Œåœ¨ Hugo ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨åˆ†ç±»ï¼Œå¿…é¡»è¿›è¡Œé…ç½®ã€‚è¿™æ˜¯é€šè¿‡åœ¨ `config/_default/taxonomies.toml` åˆ›å»ºé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å¹¶å®šä¹‰åˆ†ç±»åç§°æ¥å®Œæˆçš„ã€‚

```toml
# config/_default/taxonomies.toml

animal = "animals"
```

Hugo æœŸæœ›ä»¥å®ƒä»¬çš„å•æ•°å’Œå¤æ•°å½¢å¼åˆ—å‡ºåˆ†ç±»ï¼Œå› æ­¤æˆ‘ä»¬æ·»åŠ äº†å•æ•° `animal` ç­‰äºå¤æ•° `animals` æ¥åˆ›å»ºæˆ‘ä»¬çš„ç¤ºä¾‹åˆ†ç±»ã€‚

ç°åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬çš„ `animals` åˆ†ç±»å­˜åœ¨äº†ï¼Œå®ƒéœ€è¦è¢«æ·»åŠ åˆ°å„ä¸ªå†…å®¹é¡¹ä¸­ã€‚åªéœ€å°†å…¶æ’å…¥åˆ°å‰ç½®å…ƒæ•°æ®ä¸­ï¼š

```yaml
---
title: "Into the Lion's Den"
description: "This week we're learning about lions."
animals: ["lion", "cat"]
---
```

è¿™æ ·å°±åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬çš„ `animals` åˆ†ç±»ä¸­åˆ›å»ºäº†ä¸¤ä¸ª _æœ¯è¯­_ - `lion` å’Œ `cat`ã€‚

è™½ç„¶æ­¤æ—¶å¹¶ä¸æ˜æ˜¾ï¼Œä½† Hugo ç°åœ¨å°†ä¸ºè¿™ä¸ªæ–°çš„åˆ†ç±»ç”Ÿæˆåˆ—è¡¨å’Œæœ¯è¯­é¡µé¢ã€‚é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ `/animals/` è®¿é—®åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œè€Œæœ¯è¯­é¡µé¢å¯ä»¥åœ¨ `/animals/lion/` å’Œ `/animals/cat/` æ‰¾åˆ°ã€‚

åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢å°†åˆ—å‡ºåˆ†ç±»ä¸­åŒ…å«çš„æ‰€æœ‰æœ¯è¯­ã€‚åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªä¾‹å­ä¸­ï¼Œå¯¼èˆªåˆ° `/animals/` å°†æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸€ä¸ªé¡µé¢ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­åŒ…å«æŒ‡å‘å„ä¸ªæœ¯è¯­é¡µé¢çš„é“¾æ¥ï¼Œå¦‚ "lion" å’Œ "cat"ã€‚

æœ¯è¯­é¡µé¢å°†åˆ—å‡ºè¯¥æœ¯è¯­ä¸­åŒ…å«çš„æ‰€æœ‰é¡µé¢ã€‚è¿™äº›æœ¯è¯­åˆ—è¡¨æœ¬è´¨ä¸Šä¸æ™®é€šçš„ [åˆ—è¡¨é¡µé¢](#list-pages) ç›¸åŒï¼Œå¹¶ä»¥ç›¸ä¼¼çš„æ–¹å¼è¿ä½œã€‚

è¦å‘åˆ†ç±»é¡µé¢æ·»åŠ è‡ªå®šä¹‰å†…å®¹ï¼Œåªéœ€åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨åˆ†ç±»åç§°ä½œä¸ºå­ç›®å½•åçš„å†…å®¹æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸­åˆ›å»º `_index.md` æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
    â””â”€â”€ animals
        â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md       # /animals
        â””â”€â”€ lion
            â””â”€â”€ _index.md   # /animals/lion
```

è¿™äº›å†…å®¹æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„ä»»ä½•å†…å®¹éƒ½å°†æ”¾ç½®åˆ°ç”Ÿæˆçš„åˆ†ç±»é¡µé¢ä¸Šã€‚ä¸å…¶ä»–å†…å®¹ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œå‰ç½®å…ƒæ•°æ®å˜é‡å¯ç”¨äºè¦†ç›–é»˜è®¤è®¾ç½®ã€‚é€šè¿‡è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼ï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥æ‹¥æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªåä¸º `lion` çš„æ ‡ç­¾ï¼Œä½†å¯ä»¥è¦†ç›– `title` ä¸º "Lion"ã€‚

è¦äº†è§£å®é™…æ•ˆæœï¼Œè¯·æŸ¥çœ‹æ­¤ç«™ç‚¹ä¸Šçš„ [æ ‡ç­¾åˆ†ç±»åˆ—è¡¨]({{< ref "tags" >}})ã€‚

## å•é¡µ

|                           |                                 |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| **å¸ƒå±€ï¼š**                | `layouts/_default/single.html`  |
| **å†…å®¹ï¼ˆç‹¬ç«‹ï¼‰ï¼š**       | `content/../page-name.md`       |
| **å†…å®¹ï¼ˆæ‰“åŒ…ï¼‰ï¼š**       | `content/../page-name/index.md` |

Hugo ä¸­çš„å•é¡µåŸºæœ¬ä¸Šæ˜¯æ ‡å‡†å†…å®¹é¡µé¢ã€‚å®ƒä»¬è¢«å®šä¹‰ä¸ºä¸åŒ…å«ä»»ä½•å­é¡µé¢çš„é¡µé¢ã€‚è¿™å¯èƒ½æ˜¯å…³äºé¡µé¢ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ˜¯åšå®¢éƒ¨åˆ†ä¸­çš„å•ä¸ªåšå®¢æ–‡ç« ã€‚

å…³äºå•é¡µçš„æœ€é‡è¦çš„äº‹æƒ…æ˜¯ï¼Œä¸åˆ†æ”¯é¡µé¢ä¸åŒï¼Œå•é¡µåº”è¯¥å‘½åä¸º `index.md`ï¼Œ**æ²¡æœ‰**ä¸‹åˆ’çº¿ã€‚å•é¡µè¿˜å¾ˆç‰¹æ®Šï¼Œå› ä¸ºå®ƒä»¬å¯ä»¥åœ¨éƒ¨åˆ†çš„é¡¶å±‚è¿›è¡Œåˆ†ç»„ï¼Œå¹¶ä»¥ç‹¬ç‰¹çš„åç§°å‘½åã€‚

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
    â””â”€â”€ blog
        â”œâ”€â”€ first-post.md     # /blog/first-post
        â”œâ”€â”€ second-post.md    # /blog/second-post
        â””â”€â”€ third-post
            â”œâ”€â”€ index.md      # /blog/third-post
            â””â”€â”€ image.jpg
```

åœ¨é¡µé¢ä¸­åŒ…å«èµ„äº§ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚å›¾ç‰‡ï¼Œåº”è¯¥ä½¿ç”¨é¡µé¢åŒ…ã€‚é¡µé¢åŒ…ä½¿ç”¨å¸¦æœ‰ `index.md` æ–‡ä»¶çš„å­ç›®å½•åˆ›å»ºã€‚å°†èµ„äº§ä¸å†…å®¹ä¸€èµ·åˆ†ç»„åˆ°è‡ªå·±çš„ç›®å½•ä¸­æ˜¯é‡è¦çš„ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè®¸å¤š shortcodes å’Œå…¶ä»–ä¸»é¢˜é€»è¾‘å‡å®šèµ„æºä¸é¡µé¢ä¸€èµ·æ‰“åŒ…ã€‚

**ç¤ºä¾‹:**

```yaml
---
title: "æˆ‘çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ç¯‡åšå®¢æ–‡ç« "
date: 2022-01-25
description: "æ¬¢è¿æ¥åˆ°æˆ‘çš„åšå®¢ï¼"
summary: "äº†è§£æ›´å¤šå…³äºæˆ‘ä»¥åŠæˆ‘ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆå¼€å§‹å†™è¿™ä¸ªåšå®¢çš„ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚"
tags: ["æ¬¢è¿", "æ–°", "å…³äº", "ç¬¬ä¸€ç¯‡"]
---
_è¿™_ æ˜¯æˆ‘çš„åšå®¢æ–‡ç« çš„å†…å®¹ã€‚
```

å•é¡µæœ‰å„ç§å¯ä»¥ç”¨äºè‡ªå®šä¹‰æ˜¾ç¤ºæ–¹å¼çš„ [å‰ç½®å…ƒæ•°æ®]({{< ref "front-matter" >}}) å‚æ•°ã€‚

### å¤–éƒ¨é“¾æ¥

Congo å…·æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç‰¹æ®ŠåŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå…è®¸å¤–éƒ¨é¡µé¢çš„é“¾æ¥å‡ºç°åœ¨æ–‡ç« åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­ã€‚å¦‚æœæ‚¨åœ¨ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ç½‘ç«™ï¼ˆå¦‚ Mediumï¼‰ä¸Šæœ‰å†…å®¹ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æœ‰ç ”ç©¶è®ºæ–‡å¸Œæœ›é“¾æ¥ï¼Œè€Œä¸æƒ³åœ¨ Hugo ç«™ç‚¹ä¸­å¤åˆ¶å†…å®¹ï¼Œè¿™å°†éå¸¸æœ‰ç”¨ã€‚

è¦åˆ›å»ºå¤–éƒ¨é“¾æ¥æ–‡ç« ï¼Œéœ€è¦è®¾ç½®ä¸€äº›ç‰¹æ®Šçš„å‰ç½®å…ƒæ•°æ®ï¼š

```yaml
---
title: "æˆ‘çš„ Medium æ–‡ç« "
date: 2022-01-25
externalUrl: "https://medium.com/"
summary: "æˆ‘åœ¨ Medium ä¸Šå†™äº†ä¸€ç¯‡æ–‡ç« ã€‚"
showReadingTime: false
_build:
  render: "false"
  list: "local"
---
```

é™¤äº†æ­£å¸¸çš„å‰ç½®å…ƒæ•°æ®å‚æ•°å¦‚ `title` å’Œ `summary` å¤–ï¼Œ`externalUrl` å‚æ•°ç”¨äºå‘Šè¯‰ Congo è¿™ä¸æ˜¯ä¸€ç¯‡æ™®é€šæ–‡ç« ã€‚æ­¤å¤„æä¾›çš„ URL å°†æ˜¯è®¿é—®è€…é€‰æ‹©è¯¥æ–‡ç« æ—¶çš„ç›®æ ‡é“¾æ¥ã€‚

æ­¤å¤–ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨äº†ä¸€ä¸ªç‰¹æ®Šçš„ Hugo å‰ç½®å…ƒæ•°æ®å‚æ•° `_build` æ¥é˜»æ­¢ç”Ÿæˆæ­¤å†…å®¹çš„æ­£å¸¸é¡µé¢ - å› ä¸ºæˆ‘ä»¬æ­£åœ¨é“¾æ¥åˆ°å¤–éƒ¨ URLï¼Œç”Ÿæˆæ­£å¸¸é¡µé¢æ²¡æœ‰æ„ä¹‰ï¼

ä¸»é¢˜åŒ…å«ä¸€ä¸ªåŸå‹ï¼Œä½¿ç”Ÿæˆè¿™äº›å¤–éƒ¨é“¾æ¥æ–‡ç« å˜å¾—ç®€å•ã€‚åªéœ€åœ¨åˆ›å»ºæ–°å†…å®¹æ—¶æŒ‡å®š `-k external`ã€‚

```shell
hugo new -k external posts/my-post.md
```

### ç®€å•é¡µé¢

|                   |                                |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------ |
| **Layout:**       | `layouts/_default/simple.html` |
| **Front Matter:** | `layout: "simple"`             |

Congo è¿˜åŒ…æ‹¬ä¸€ä¸ªä¸“é—¨ç”¨äºç®€å•é¡µé¢çš„ç‰¹æ®Šå¸ƒå±€ã€‚ç®€å•å¸ƒå±€æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå…¨å®½åº¦çš„æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œåªéœ€å°† Markdown å†…å®¹æ”¾å…¥é¡µé¢ï¼Œè€Œä¸åŒ…å«ä»»ä½•ç‰¹æ®Šçš„ä¸»é¢˜åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

ç®€å•å¸ƒå±€ä¸­å”¯ä¸€å¯ç”¨çš„åŠŸèƒ½æ˜¯é¢åŒ…å±‘å’Œåˆ†äº«é“¾æ¥ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œè¿™äº›çš„è¡Œä¸ºä»ç„¶å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä½¿ç”¨æ­£å¸¸é¡µé¢ [å‰ç½®å…ƒæ•°æ®]({{< ref "front-matter" >}}) å˜é‡è¿›è¡Œæ§åˆ¶ã€‚

è¦åœ¨ç‰¹å®šé¡µé¢ä¸Šå¯ç”¨ç®€å•å¸ƒå±€ï¼Œè¯·æ·»åŠ  `layout` å‰ç½®å…ƒæ•°æ®å˜é‡ï¼Œå…¶å€¼ä¸º `"simple"`ï¼š

```yaml
---
title: "æˆ‘çš„è½åœ°é¡µ"
date: 2022-03-08

---
æ­¤é¡µé¢å†…å®¹ç°åœ¨æ˜¯å…¨å®½åº¦çš„ã€‚

## è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¸ƒå±€

Hugo çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå¥½å¤„æ˜¯å®ƒä½¿å¾—ä¸ºæ•´ä¸ªç«™ç‚¹ã€å•ç‹¬çš„éƒ¨åˆ†æˆ–é¡µé¢åˆ›å»ºè‡ªå®šä¹‰å¸ƒå±€å˜å¾—å¾ˆå®¹æ˜“ã€‚

å¸ƒå±€éµå¾ªæ‰€æœ‰å¸¸è§„çš„ Hugo æ¨¡æ¿è§„åˆ™ï¼Œæ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯è¯·å‚é˜…[å®˜æ–¹ Hugo æ–‡æ¡£](https://gohugo.io/templates/introduction/)ã€‚

### è¦†ç›–é»˜è®¤å¸ƒå±€

ä¸Šé¢è®¨è®ºçš„æ¯ç§å†…å®¹ç±»å‹éƒ½åˆ—å‡ºäº†ç”¨äºç”Ÿæˆæ¯ç§é¡µé¢ç±»å‹çš„å¸ƒå±€æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚å¦‚æœåœ¨æœ¬åœ°é¡¹ç›®ä¸­åˆ›å»ºäº†æ­¤æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå®ƒå°†è¦†ç›–ä¸»é¢˜æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¯ç”¨äºè‡ªå®šä¹‰ç½‘ç«™çš„é»˜è®¤æ ·å¼ã€‚

ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª `layouts/_default/single.html` æ–‡ä»¶å°†å…è®¸å®Œå…¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¶é¡µé¢çš„å¸ƒå±€ã€‚

### è‡ªå®šä¹‰éƒ¨åˆ†å¸ƒå±€

ä¸ºä¸ªåˆ«å†…å®¹éƒ¨åˆ†åˆ›å»ºè‡ªå®šä¹‰å¸ƒå±€ä¹Ÿå¾ˆç®€å•ã€‚å½“æ‚¨æƒ³è¦ä½¿ç”¨ç‰¹å®šæ ·å¼åˆ—å‡ºæŸç§ç±»å‹å†…å®¹çš„éƒ¨åˆ†æ—¶ï¼Œè¿™å°†éå¸¸æœ‰ç”¨ã€‚

è®©æˆ‘ä»¬é€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹æ¥åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„â€œé¡¹ç›®â€é¡µé¢ï¼Œè¯¥é¡µé¢ä½¿ç”¨ç‰¹æ®Šå¸ƒå±€åˆ—å‡ºé¡¹ç›®ã€‚

ä¸ºäº†åšåˆ°è¿™ä¸€ç‚¹ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨å¸¸è§„çš„ Hugo å†…å®¹è§„åˆ™æ„å»ºæ‚¨çš„å†…å®¹ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸ºæ‚¨çš„é¡¹ç›®åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°éƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚æ­¤å¤–ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä½¿ç”¨ä¸å†…å®¹ç›¸åŒçš„ç›®å½•åç§°å¹¶æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ª `list.html` æ–‡ä»¶æ¥ä¸ºé¡¹ç›®éƒ¨åˆ†åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°å¸ƒå±€ã€‚

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ projects
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ first-project.md
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ second-project.md
â””â”€â”€ layouts
    â””â”€â”€ projects
        â””â”€â”€ list.html
```

è¿™ä¸ª `list.html` æ–‡ä»¶ç°åœ¨å°†è¦†ç›–é»˜è®¤çš„åˆ—è¡¨æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œä½†ä»…é€‚ç”¨äº `projects` éƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬æŸ¥çœ‹è¿™ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œè®©æˆ‘ä»¬é¦–å…ˆæŸ¥çœ‹ä¸ªåˆ«é¡¹ç›®æ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

```yaml
---
title: "Congo"
date: 2021-08-11
icon: "github"
description: "A theme for Hugo built with Tailwind CSS."
topics: ["Hugo", "Web", "Tailwind"]
externalUrl: "https://github.com/jpanther/congo/"
---
```

_åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®åˆ†é…äº†ä¸€äº›å…ƒæ•°æ®ï¼Œç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬çš„åˆ—è¡¨æ¨¡æ¿ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨è¿™äº›å…ƒæ•°æ®ã€‚è¿™é‡Œæ²¡æœ‰é¡µé¢å†…å®¹ï¼Œä½†æ²¡æœ‰é˜»æ­¢æ‚¨åŒ…å«å®ƒã€‚æ¯•ç«Ÿè¿™æ˜¯æ‚¨è‡ªå·±çš„è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ¨¡æ¿ï¼_

æœ‰äº†å®šä¹‰çš„é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œç°åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªåˆ—è¡¨æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºæ¯ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®çš„è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

```go
{{ define "main" }}
  <section class="mt-8">
    {{ range .Pages }}
      <article class="pb-6">
        <a class="flex" href="{{ .Params.externalUrl }}">
          <div class="mr-3 text-3xl text-neutral-300">
            <span class="relative inline-block align-text-bottom">
              {{ partial "icon.html" .Params.icon }}
            </span>
          </div>
          <div>
            <h3 class="flex text-xl font-semibold">
              {{ .Title }}
            </h3>
            <p class="text-sm text-neutral-400">
              {{ .Description }}
            </p>
          </div>
        </a>
      </article>
    {{ end }}
  </section>
{{ end }}
```

è™½ç„¶è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç›¸å½“ç®€å•çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼Œä½†æ‚¨å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°å®ƒé€æ­¥å¤„ç†æ­¤éƒ¨åˆ†ä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸ªé¡µé¢ï¼ˆå³æ¯ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®ï¼‰ï¼Œç„¶åè¾“å‡ºåˆ°æ¯ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®æ—è¾¹çš„ HTML é“¾æ¥å’Œå›¾æ ‡ã€‚æ¯ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®çš„å‰ç½®å…ƒæ•°æ®ç”¨äºç¡®å®šæ˜¾ç¤ºå“ªäº›ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

è¯·è®°ä½ï¼Œæ‚¨éœ€è¦ç¡®ä¿ç›¸å…³çš„æ ·å¼å’Œç±»å¯ç”¨ï¼Œè¿™å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦é‡æ–°ç¼–è¯‘ Tailwind CSSã€‚è¿™åœ¨ [é«˜çº§è‡ªå®šä¹‰]({{< ref "advanced-customisation" >}}) éƒ¨åˆ†ä¸­æœ‰æ›´è¯¦ç»†çš„è®¨è®ºã€‚

åœ¨åˆ›å»ºæ­¤ç±»è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ¨¡æ¿æ—¶ï¼Œæœ€ç®€å•çš„æ–¹æ³•å§‹ç»ˆæ˜¯æŸ¥çœ‹é»˜è®¤ Congo æ¨¡æ¿çš„å·¥ä½œæ–¹å¼ï¼Œç„¶åå°†å…¶ç”¨ä½œæŒ‡å—ã€‚è®°ä½ï¼Œ[Hugo æ–‡æ¡£](https://gohugo.io/templates/introduction/)ä¹Ÿæ˜¯å­¦ä¹ æœ‰å…³åˆ›å»ºæ¨¡æ¿çš„æ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯çš„ç»ä½³èµ„æºã€‚

draft: false
description: "All the front matter variables available in Congo."
summary: "While supporting most Hugo defaults, Congo adds a number of front matter parameters to customise the presentation of individual articles."
slug: "front-matter"
tags: ["front matter", "config", "docs"]
---

In addition to the [default Hugo front matter parameters](https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter/#front-matter-variables), Congo adds a number of additional options to customise the presentation of individual articles. All the available theme front matter parameters are listed below.

Front matter parameter default values are inherited from the theme's [base configuration]({{< ref "configuration" >}}), so you only need to specify these parameters in your front matter when you want to override the default.

<!-- prettier-ignore-start -->
|Name|Default|Description|
|---|---|---|
|`title`|_Not set_|The name of the article.|
|`description`|_Not set_|The text description for the article. It is used in the HTML metadata.|
|`feature`|`"*feature*"`|The text pattern to match the feature image filename for this article.|
|`featureAlt`|`""`|The alternative text description for the feature image.|
|`cover`|`"*cover*"`|The text pattern to match the cover image filename for this article.|
|`coverAlt`|`featureAlt`|The alternative text description for the cover image.|
|`coverCaption`|_Not set_|The figure caption text to be displayed beneath the cover image.|
|`thumbnail`|`"*thumb*"`_|The text pattern to match the thumbnail image filename for this article.|
|`thumbnailAlt`|`featureAlt`|The alternative text description for the thumbnail image.|
|`externalUrl`|_Not set_|If this article is published on a third-party website, the URL to this article. Providing a URL will prevent a content page being generated and any references to this article will link directly to the third-party website.|
|`canonicalUrl`|`.Permalink`|When set, this overrides the canonical URL metadata for the article.|
|`editURL`|`article.editURL`|When `showEdit` is active, the URL for the edit link.|
|`editAppendPath`|`article.editAppendPath`|When `showEdit` is active, whether or not the path to the current article should be appended to the URL set at `editURL`.|
|`groupByYear`|`list.groupByYear`|Whether or not articles are grouped by year on list pages.|
|`keywords`|_Not set_|Any keywords that should be included in the article metadata.|
|`menu`|_Not set_|When a value is provided, a link to this article will appear in the named menus. Valid values are `main` or `footer`.|
|`robots`|_Not set_|String that indicates how robots should handle this article. If set, it will be output in the page head. Refer to [Google's docs](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/robots/robots_meta_tag#directives) for valid values.|
|`sharingLinks`|`article.sharingLinks`|Which sharing links to display at the end of this article. When not provided, or set to `false` no links will be displayed.|
|`showAuthor`|`article.showAuthor`|Whether or not the author box is displayed in the article footer.|
|`showBreadcrumbs`|`article.showBreadcrumbs` or `list.showBreadcrumbs`|Whether the breadcrumbs are displayed in the article or list header.|
|`showDate`|`article.showDate`|Whether or not the article date is displayed. The date is set using the `date` parameter.|
|`showDateUpdated`|`article.showDateUpdated`|Whether or not the date the article was updated is displayed. The date is set using the `lastmod` parameter.|
|`showEdit`|`article.showEdit`|Whether or not the link to edit the article content should be displayed.|
|`showHeadingAnchors`|`article.showHeadingAnchors`|Whether or not heading anchor links are displayed alongside headings within this article.|
|`showPagination`|`article.showPagination`|Whether or not the next/previous article links are displayed in the article footer.|
|`invertPagination`|`article.invertPagination`|Whether or not to flip the direction of the next/previous article links.|
|`showReadingTime`|`article.showReadingTime`|Whether or not the article reading time is displayed.|
|`showTaxonomies`|`article.showTaxonomies`|Whether or not the taxonomies that relate to this article are displayed.|
|`showTableOfContents`|`article.showTableOfContents`|Whether or not the table of contents is displayed on this article.|
|`showWordCount`|`article.showWordCount`|Whether or not the article word count is displayed.|
|`showComments`|`article.showComments`|Whether or not the [comments partial]({{< ref "partials#comments" >}}) is included after the article footer.|
|`showSummary`|`list.showSummary`|Whether or not the article summary should be displayed on list pages.|
|`summary`|Auto generated using `summaryLength` (see [site configuration]({{< ref "configuration#site-configuration" >}}))|When `showSummary` is enabled, this is the Markdown string to be used as the summary for this article.|
|`xml`|`true` unless excluded by `sitemap.excludedKinds`|Whether or not this article is included in the generated `/sitemap.xml` file.|
<!-- prettier-ignore-end -->

==================================================

é™¤äº†[é»˜è®¤ Hugo çš„Front Matterå˜é‡](https://gohugo.io/content-management/front-matter/#front-matter-variables)ä¹‹å¤–ï¼ŒCongo æ·»åŠ äº†è®¸å¤šé¢å¤–çš„é€‰é¡¹ï¼Œä»¥å®šåˆ¶å•ä¸ªæ–‡ç« çš„å‘ˆç°æ–¹å¼ã€‚ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯æ‰€æœ‰å¯ç”¨çš„ä¸»é¢˜å‰ç½®å˜é‡å‚æ•°ã€‚

### FILE: themes/congo/exampleSite/content/docs/getting-started/index.ja.md
--------------------------------------------------
---
title: "ã¯ã˜ã‚ã«"
date: 2020-08-15
draft: false
description: "Congoã‚’ä½¿ã„å§‹ã‚ã‚‹æ–¹æ³•"
summary: "ã“ã®ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã§ã¯ã€ã™ã§ã«Congoã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ã€ã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒ ã€ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã€ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„æ§‹é€ ã®é¸æŠãªã©åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªè¨­å®šä½œæ¥­ã‚’è¡Œã†æº–å‚™ãŒã§ãã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’å‰æã¨ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚"
slug: "getting-started"
tags: ["installation", "docs"]
---

{{< alert >}}
ã“ã®ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã¯ã‚ãªãŸãŒæ—¢ã«[ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«]({{< ref "docs/installation" >}})ã‚’çµ‚ãˆã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’å‰æã¨ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
{{< /alert >}}

Congoã«åŒæ¢±ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹è¨­å®šãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«ã¯ã€ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒãŒèªè­˜ã§ãã‚‹ã™ã¹ã¦ã®è¨­å®šãŒå«ã¾ã‚ŒãŠã‚Šã€ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã§ã¯å¤šãã¯ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ãŒã€ç‰¹å®šã®æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’æœ‰åŠ¹ã«ã—ãŸã‚Šå¤‰æ›´ã—ãŸã‚Šã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ã€ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã‚’è§£é™¤ã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã™ã€‚

## åŸºæœ¬è¨­å®š

ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹å‰ã«ã€æ–°è¦ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ç”¨ã«è¨­å®šã™ã¹ãã“ã¨ãŒã„ãã¤ã‹ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã¾ãš `config.toml` ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã§ã€`baseURL` ã¨ `languageCode` ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã€ `languageCode` ã«ã¯ã€ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã®ä½œæˆã«ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®è¨€èªã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

```toml
# config/_default/config.toml

baseURL = "https://your_domain.com/"
languageCode = "en"
```

æ¬¡ã®ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒƒãƒ—ã¯è¨€èªè¨­å®šã§ã™ã€‚Congoã¯å¤šè¨€èªã‚’ã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ãŒã€ä»Šã¯ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã®è¨€èªã ã‘ã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

`config/_default` ã®ä¸­ã«ã‚ã‚‹ `languages.en.toml` ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’æ¢ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³è¨€èªãŒè‹±èªã®å ´åˆã¯ã€ã“ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ãã®ã¾ã¾ä½¿ã†ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ãã†ã§ãªã„å ´åˆã¯ã€ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«åã«æ­£ã—ã„è¨€èªã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒå«ã¾ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«åã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ä¾‹ãˆã°ãƒ•ãƒ©ãƒ³ã‚¹èªã®å ´åˆã¯ã€ `languages.fr.toml` ã«ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«åã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

{{< alert >}}
è¨€èªè¨­å®šãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«åã®è¨€èªã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¯ã€ `config.toml` ã® `languageCode` è¨­å®šã¨ä¸€è‡´ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚
{{< /alert >}}

```toml
# config/_default/languages.en.toml

title = "My awesome website"

[params.author]
name = "My name"
image = "img/author.jpg"
headline = "A generally awesome human"
bio = "A little bit about me"
links = [
  { twitter = "https://twitter.com/username" }
]
```

`[params.author]` ã¯ã‚¦ã‚§ãƒ–ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆä¸Šã§ã©ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«è‘—è€…æƒ…å ±ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹ã‹ã‚’æ±ºå®šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ç”»åƒã¯ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã® `assets/` ã«ç½®ãã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã¯ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã®è¨˜è¿°é †ã«æ²¿ã£ã¦è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

å„è¨­å®šã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹è©³ç´°æƒ…å ±ã¯ã€[è¨­å®š]({{< ref "configuration" >}})ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã§èª¬æ˜ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

## ã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒ 

Congoã«ã¯ã„ãã¤ã‹ã®ã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒ ãŒåŒæ¢±ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚é…è‰²ã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ã€`colorScheme` ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã™ã€‚æœ‰åŠ¹ãªã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã¯ `congo` ï¼ˆãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆï¼‰ã€ `avocado` ã€ `cherry` ã€ `fire` ã€ `ocean` ã€ `sapphire` ã€ `slate` ã§ã™ã€‚

{{< alert >}}
`colourScheme` ã®å€¤ã¯å°æ–‡å­—ã§æŒ‡å®šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
{{< /alert >}}

```toml
# config/_default/params.toml

colorScheme = "congo"
```

Congoã¯ã€ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒå…¨ä½“ã§ä½¿ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã‚‹3è‰²ã®ãƒ‘ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒˆã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ãã‚Œãã‚Œã®ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚«ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã«ã¯ã€[Tailwind](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/customizing-colors#color-palette-reference)ã«å«ã¾ã‚Œã‚‹10è‰²ã®æ¿ƒæ·¡ãŒå«ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

#### Congo (default)

{{< swatches "#71717a" "#8b5cf6" "#d946ef" >}}

#### Avocado

{{< swatches "#78716c" "#84cc16" "#10b981" >}}

#### Cherry

{{< swatches "#737373" "#f43f5e" "#22c55e" >}}

#### Fire

{{< swatches "#78716c" "#f97316" "#f43f5e" >}}

#### Ocean

{{< swatches "#64748b" "#3b82f6" "#06b6d4" >}}

#### Sapphire

{{< swatches "#64748b" "#6366f1" "#ec4899" >}}

#### Slate

{{< swatches "#6B7280" "#64748b" "#6B7280" >}}

ç‹¬è‡ªã®é…è‰²ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚è©³ã—ãã¯ [é«˜åº¦ãªè¨­å®š]({{< ref "advanced-customisation#colour-schemes" >}})ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’å‚ç…§ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

## ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã®æ•´ç†

Congoã¯ç‰¹å®šã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ã‚’å¼·åˆ¶ã—ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ãã®ãŸã‚ã€è‡ªç”±ã«ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’å®šç¾©ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚é™çš„ãªã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã«ã¯*pages*ã€ãƒ–ãƒ­ã‚°ã«ã¯*posts*ã€ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒªã‚ªã«ã¯*projects*ãŒã„ã„ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚

### ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªæ§‹é€ 

åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªCongoãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã®æ¦‚è¦ã‚’èª¬æ˜ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã¯ `content` ã«ç½®ã‹ã‚Œã¾ã™:

```shell
.
â”œâ”€â”€ assets
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ img
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ author.jpg
â”œâ”€â”€ config
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ _default
â”œâ”€â”€ content
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ about.md
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ posts
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ first-post.md
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ another-post
â”‚           â”œâ”€â”€ aardvark.jpg
â”‚           â””â”€â”€ index.md
â””â”€â”€ themes
    â””â”€â”€ congo
```

{{< alert >}}
ã“ã“ã§æ³¨æ„ã—ãªã‘ã‚Œã°ãªã‚‰ãªã„ã®ã¯ã€ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã®ä¸­ã§ã€é€šå¸¸ã®è¨˜äº‹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯ `index.md` ã¨ã„ã†åå‰ã«ãªã‚Šã€ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯ `_index.md` ã¨ã„ã†åå‰ã«ãªã‚‹ã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã§ã™ã€‚è¨˜äº‹ã«ä»˜éšã™ã‚‹ã‚¢ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã¯ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ‡ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã¨ä¸€ç·’ã«ã‚µãƒ–ãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ¬ã‚¯ãƒˆãƒªã«ç½®ãå¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚
{{< /alert >}}

ã“ã®ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã¯Hugoã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ«ã‚’æœ€å¤§é™ã«æ´»ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«è¨­è¨ˆã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã€HugoãŒã©ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’æ•´ç†ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’æƒ³å®šã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹ã‚’ã—ã£ã‹ã‚Šã¨æŠŠæ¡ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒé‡è¦ã§ã™ã€‚è©³ã—ãã¯[Hugoå…¬å¼ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆ](https://gohugo.io/content-management/organization/)ã‚’èª­ã‚“ã§ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

### featureã€coverã€ãã—ã¦thumb(nail)

Congoã¯ã€è¨˜äº‹ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã¨å€‹ã€…ã®è¨˜äº‹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ä¸Šéƒ¨ã«ç”»åƒã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ç”»åƒã«ã¯3ã¤ã®ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ãŒã‚ã‚Šã€ãã‚Œãã‚Œã«ä½¿ç”¨ä¾‹ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™: `feature` ã€ `cover` ã€ `thumb` ã§ã™ã€‚

ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ä¾‹ã§ã¯ã€ `first-post` ã®è¨˜äº‹ã« `cover` ã¨ `thumb` ã‚’ç”¨æ„ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™:

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
    â””â”€â”€ posts
        â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md
        â””â”€â”€ first-post
            â”œâ”€â”€ cover.jpg
            â”œâ”€â”€ index.md
            â””â”€â”€ thumb.jpg
```

`thumb` ç”»åƒã¯è¨˜äº‹ã®ã‚µãƒ ãƒã‚¤ãƒ«ã¨ã—ã¦è¨˜äº‹ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã§è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã€ `cover` ç”»åƒã¯å€‹ã€…ã®è¨˜äº‹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§è¨˜äº‹å†…å®¹ã®ä¸Šéƒ¨ã«è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

![A screenshot of an article with a thumbnail image](article-screenshot.jpg "ã“ã®ä¾‹ã§ã¯ã€ `thumb` ç”»åƒä»˜ãã®è¨˜äº‹ã‚’ç¤ºã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚")

{{< alert >}}
ãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ã®è¦³ç‚¹ã‹ã‚‰ã€ `thumb` ç”»åƒã¯è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«4:3ã®æ¯”ç‡ã«ãƒˆãƒªãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°ãƒ»ãƒªã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ `cover` ç”»åƒã¯å†…å®¹ã«åˆã‚ã›ã¦è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«ãƒªã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ãŒã€æ¯”ç‡ã¯å•ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚
{{< /alert >}}

The `feature` image is a special type, and when present, it will be used in place of _both_ the `thumb` and `cover` images. Feature images are also present in the article metadata, which is included when content is shared to third-party networks like Facebook and Twitter.
`feature` ç”»åƒã¯ç‰¹åˆ¥ã§ã€å­˜åœ¨ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã«ã¯ `thumb` ç”»åƒã¨ `cover` ç”»åƒã®ä¸¡æ–¹ã®ä»£ã‚ã‚Šã«ä½¿ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ `feature` ç”»åƒã¯è¨˜äº‹ã®ãƒ¡ã‚¿ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã¨ã—ã¦ã€Facebookã‚„Twitterã®ã‚ˆã†ãªã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ã®ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã«ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ãŒå…±æœ‰ã•ã‚Œã‚‹å ´åˆã«ã‚‚å«ã¾ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

Congoã¯è¨˜äº‹ç”»åƒã‚’ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒªã‚¸ã‚§ãƒ³ãƒˆã«æ¤œå‡ºã—ã€è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«ã‚ãªãŸã®ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã«è¿½åŠ ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ³ãƒˆãƒã‚¿ãƒ¼ã§ãã‚Œã‚‰ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ã¯ãªãã€ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒªã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹å†…ã«é©åˆ‡ãªåå‰ã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’é…ç½®ã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã™ã€‚ç”»åƒãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«åã®ã©ã“ã‹ã« `feature` ã€ `cover` ã€ `thumb` ã¨ã„ã†å˜èªãŒã‚ã‚Œã°ã€ãã‚ŒãŒãã®ç›®çš„ã§ä½¿ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

[ä¾‹]({{< ref "samples" >}})ã«ã¯ã€ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®ç”»åƒã®ä¾‹ãŒå¤šæ•°æ²è¼‰ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ï¼ˆã¾ãŸã€[ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰](https://github.com/jpanther/congo/tree/dev/exampleSite/content/samples)ã‚’å‚ç…§ã—ã¦ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«æ§‹é€ ã‚’ç¢ºèªã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã§ãã¾ã™ï¼‰ã€‚

### Taxonomies

Congoã¯Taxonomiesã«é–¢ã—ã¦ã‚‚æŸ”è»Ÿã§ã™ã€‚ `tags` ã‚„ `categories` ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚’ã‚°ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ—åŒ–ã—ãŸã„äººã‚‚ã„ã‚Œã°ã€ `topics` ã‚’ä½¿ã„ãŸã„äººã‚‚ã„ã‚‹ã§ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚

Hugoã¯ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã§ `posts` ã€ `tags` ã€ `categories` ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã—ã‹ã—ã€ã“ã‚Œã‚’ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã—ãŸã„å ´åˆã¯ã€ `taxonomies.toml` è¨­å®šãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã§ãã¾ã™:

```toml
# config/_default/taxonomies.toml

topic = "topics"
```

ä¸Šè¨˜ã®ä¾‹ã¯ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã® _tags_ ã¨ _categories_ ã‚’ _topics_ ã«ç½®ãæ›ãˆã¾ã™ã€‚è©³ç´°ã¯ã€[Hugo Taxonomy docs](https://gohugo.io/content-management/taxonomies/)ã‚’å‚ç…§ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

When you create a new taxonomy, you will need to adjust the navigation links on the website to point to the correct sections, which is covered below.

## ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼

Congoã«ã¯2ã¤ã®ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãŒã‚ã‚Šã€ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã®å†…å®¹ã‚„ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã«åˆã‚ã›ã¦ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ `main` ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã¯ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã®ãƒ˜ãƒƒãƒ€ãƒ¼ã«è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã€ `footer` ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã¯ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ä¸€ç•ªä¸‹ã€è‘—ä½œæ¨©è¡¨ç¤ºã®ã™ãä¸Šã«è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

Both menus are configured in the `menus.en.toml` file. Similarly to the languages config file, if you wish to use another language, rename this file and replace `en` with the language code you wish to use. Menu links will be sorted from lowest to highest `weight`, and then alphabetically by `name`.
ã©ã¡ã‚‰ã®ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚‚ `menus.en.toml` ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã§è¨­å®šã™ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ `menus.en.toml` ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã¯è¨€èªè¨­å®šãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã¨åŒæ§˜ã«ã€ä»–ã®è¨€èªã‚’ä½¿ã„ãŸã„å ´åˆã¯ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«åã‚’å¤‰æ›´ã—ã¦ä½¿ã„ãŸã„è¨€èªã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã«ç½®ãæ›ãˆã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã®ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã¯ `weight` ã®ä½ã„ã‚‚ã®ã‹ã‚‰é«˜ã„ã‚‚ã®ã¸ã¨ã‚½ãƒ¼ãƒˆã•ã‚Œã€æ¬¡ã«ã‚¢ãƒ«ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ™ãƒƒãƒˆé †ã« `name` ã§ã‚½ãƒ¼ãƒˆã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚

```toml
# config/_default/menus.en.toml

[[main]]
  name = "Blog"
  pageRef = "posts"
  weight = 10

[[main]]
  name = "Topics"
  pageRef = "topics"
  weight = 20

[[main]]
  name = "GitHub"
  url = "https://github.com/jpanther/congo"
  weight = 30
  [main.params]
    icon = "github"
    showName = false
    target = "_blank"

[[main]]
  identifier = "search"
  weight = 99
  [main.params]
    action = "search"
    icon = "search"

[[footer]]
  name = "Privacy"
  pageRef = "privacy"
```

### åŸºæœ¬ã®ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯

`name` ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã¯ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã§ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’æŒ‡å®šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã¾ãŸã€ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã§ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã®HTMLã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«å±æ€§ã¨ãªã‚‹ `title` ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

`pageRef` ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’ä½¿ã†ã¨ã€Hugoã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚„Taxonomyã‚’ç°¡å˜ã«å‚ç…§ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚Hugoã®ã‚³ãƒ³ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ„ã‚¢ã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒ ã‚’å‚ç…§ã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã€è‡ªå‹•çš„ã«æ­£ã—ã„ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ãŒä½œæˆã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã®ã§ã€ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚’è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹æœ€ã‚‚ç°¡å˜ãªæ–¹æ³•ã§ã™ã€‚å¤–éƒ¨URLã¸ã®ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã«ã¯ `url` ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯å†…ã« `params` ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã€ã•ã‚‰ãªã‚‹ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºãŒå¯èƒ½ã§ã™ã€‚ `icon` ã‚’è¿½åŠ ã—ãŸã‚Šã€ `showName` ã§ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆãŸã‚Šã€URLã« `target` ã‚’è¨­å®šã—ãŸã‚Šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ä¸Šè¨˜ã®ä¾‹ã§ã¯ã€GitHubãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã¯ã‚¢ã‚¤ã‚³ãƒ³ã®ã¿ã§è¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã¯æ–°ã—ã„ã‚¦ã‚£ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã‚¦ã§é–‹ãã¾ã™ã€‚

### ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯

There is a special case for creating menu items for links that take theme actions. These are denoted using the `action` parameter, and a value of the action the link should perform. Action links allow for all the same custom parameters as other links and can be styled with an icon or text name.
ç‰¹åˆ¥ãªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã¨ã—ã¦ã€ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œã™ã‚‹ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯é …ç›®ã‚’ä½œæˆã™ã‚‹å ´åˆãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã¯ `action` ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã¨å®Ÿè¡Œã™ã‚‹ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®å€¤ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦æŒ‡å®šã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã§ã¯åŸºæœ¬ã®ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã¨åŒã˜ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã€ã‚¢ã‚¤ã‚³ãƒ³ã‚„ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆåã§ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

æœ‰åŠ¹ãªãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ»ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã¯2ã¤ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™:

- `appearance` ã¯å¤–è¦³ã‚’åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆã‚‹ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™
- `search` ã¯ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆå†…æ¤œç´¢ã‚’è¡Œã†ãƒªãƒ³ã‚¯ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã™

ã©ã¡ã‚‰ã®ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚‚å®Œå…¨ã«ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã§ã‚ã‚Šã€å¿…è¦ãªã‘ã‚Œã°ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã¨ã—ã¦æä¾›ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ãƒ†ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚‚å‚è€ƒã«ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

## è©³ç´°ãªè¨­å®š

ä¸Šè¨˜ã®æ‰‹é †ã¯æœ€ä½é™ã®è¨­å®šã§ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã§ `hugo server` ã‚’å®Ÿè¡Œã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€ç©ºç™½ã®Congoã‚¦ã‚§ãƒ–ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚è©³ç´°ãªè¨­å®šã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã¯ã€[è¨­å®š]({{< ref "configuration" >}})ã‚»ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’å‚ç…§ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

==================================================

### FILE: themes/congo/exampleSite/content/docs/getting-started/index.md
--------------------------------------------------
---
title: "Getting Started"
date: 2020-08-15
draft: false
description: "Learn how to get started using the Congo theme."
summary: "This section assumes you have already installed the Congo theme and are ready to start with basic configuration tasks like selecting a colour scheme, menu and content structure."
slug: "getting-started"
tags: ["installation", "docs"]
---

{{< alert >}}
This section assumes you have already [installed the Congo theme]({{< ref "docs/installation" >}}).
{{< /alert >}}

The config files that ship with Congo contain all of the possible settings that the theme recognises. By default, many of these are commented out but you can simply uncomment them to activate or change a specific feature.

## Basic configuration

Before creating any content, there are a few things you should set for a new installation. Starting in the `hugo.toml` file, set the `baseURL` and `languageCode` parameters. The `languageCode` should be set to the main language that you will be using to author your content.

```toml
# config/_default/hugo.toml

baseURL = "https://your_domain.com/"
languageCode = "en"
```

The next step is to configure the language settings. Although Congo supports multilingual setups, for now, just configure the main language.

Locate the `languages.en.toml` file in the config folder. If your main language is English you can use this file as is. Otherwise, rename it so that it includes the correct language code in the filename. For example, for French, rename the file to `languages.fr.toml`.

{{< alert >}}
The language code in the language config filename should match the `languageCode` setting in `hugo.toml`.
{{< /alert >}}

```toml
# config/_default/languages.en.toml

title = "My awesome website"

[params.author]
name = "My name"
image = "img/author.jpg"
headline = "A generally awesome human"
bio = "A little bit about me"
links = [
  { twitter = "https://twitter.com/username" }
]
```

The `[params.author]` configuration determines how the author information is displayed on the website. The image should be placed in the site's `assets/` folder. Links will be displayed in the order they are listed.

If you need extra detail, further information about each of these configuration options, is covered in the [Configuration]({{< ref "configuration" >}}) section.

## Colour schemes

Congo ships with a number of colour schemes out of the box. To change the scheme, simply set the `colorScheme` theme parameter. Valid options are `congo` (default), `avocado`, `cherry`, `fire`, `ocean`, `sapphire` and `slate`.

{{< alert >}}
The `colourScheme` value should be provided in lowercase.
{{< /alert >}}

```toml
# config/_default/params.toml

colorScheme = "congo"
```

Congo defines a three-colour palette that is used throughout the theme. Each main colour contains ten shades which are based upon the colours that are included in [Tailwind](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/customizing-colors#color-palette-reference).

#### Congo (default)

{{< swatches "#71717a" "#8b5cf6" "#d946ef" >}}

#### Avocado

{{< swatches "#78716c" "#84cc16" "#10b981" >}}

#### Cherry

{{< swatches "#737373" "#f43f5e" "#22c55e" >}}

#### Fire

{{< swatches "#78716c" "#f97316" "#f43f5e" >}}

#### Ocean

{{< swatches "#64748b" "#3b82f6" "#06b6d4" >}}

#### Sapphire

{{< swatches "#64748b" "#6366f1" "#ec4899" >}}

#### Slate

{{< swatches "#6B7280" "#64748b" "#6B7280" >}}

Although these are the default schemes, you can also create your own. Refer to the [Advanced Customisation]({{< ref "advanced-customisation#colour-schemes" >}}) section for details.

## Organising content

By default, Congo doesn't force you to use a particular content type. In doing so you are free to define your content as you wish. You might prefer _pages_ for a static site, _posts_ for a blog, or _projects_ for a portfolio.

### Directory structure

Here's a quick overview of a basic Congo project. All content is placed within the `content` folder:

```shell
.
â”œâ”€â”€ assets
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ img
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ author.jpg
â”œâ”€â”€ config
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ _default
â”œâ”€â”€ content
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ about.md
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ posts
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ first-post.md
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ another-post
â”‚           â”œâ”€â”€ aardvark.jpg
â”‚           â””â”€â”€ index.md
â””â”€â”€ themes
    â””â”€â”€ congo
```

{{< alert >}}
The key thing to note here is that within the content directory, normal article pages are named `index.md` while list pages are named `_index.md`. Any assets that go along with the article should be placed in a sub-directory alongside the index file.
{{< /alert >}}

It's important to have a firm grasp of how Hugo expects content to be organised as the theme is designed to take full advantage of Hugo page bundles. Be sure to read the [official Hugo docs](https://gohugo.io/content-management/organization/) for more information.

### Feature, cover and thumbnail images

The Congo theme supports displaying images on article listings and at the top of individual article pages. There are three types of images supported, each with their own use case: `feature`, `cover` and `thumb`.

In the example below, a cover and thumb image have been provided for the `first-post` article:

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
    â””â”€â”€ posts
        â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md
        â””â”€â”€ first-post
            â”œâ”€â”€ cover.jpg
            â”œâ”€â”€ index.md
            â””â”€â”€ thumb.jpg
```

The `thumb` image is used as the article thumbnail and will be displayed in article lists, and the `cover` image will be displayed at the top of the article content on individual article pages.

![A screenshot of an article with a thumbnail image](article-screenshot.jpg "This example shows an article with a thumbnail image.")

{{< alert >}}
In order to provide maximum performance, thumbnail images are automatically cropped and resized to a 4:3 ratio. Cover images will be automatically resized to fit their content, but any ratio is permitted.
{{< /alert >}}

The `feature` image is a special type, and when present, it will be used in place of _both_ the `thumb` and `cover` images. Feature images are also present in the article metadata, which is included when content is shared to third-party networks like Facebook and Twitter.

The theme will intelligently detect article images and automatically add them to your site. You don't have to refer to them in the front matter and simply need to place an appropriately named file within the page resources. If the term `feature`, `cover` or `thumb` is found anywhere in the image filename, then it will be used for that purpose.

The [Samples section]({{< ref "samples" >}}) provides a number of examples of these images (and you can view the [source code](https://github.com/jpanther/congo/tree/dev/exampleSite/content/samples) to see the file structure).

### Taxonomies

Congo is also flexible when it comes to taxonomies. Some people prefer to use _tags_ and _categories_ to group their content, others prefer to use _topics_.

Hugo defaults to using posts, tags and categories out of the box and this will work fine if that's what you want. If you wish to customise this, however, you can do so by creating a `taxonomies.toml` configuration file:

```toml
# config/_default/taxonomies.toml

topic = "topics"
```

This will replace the default _tags_ and _categories_ with _topics_. Refer to the [Hugo Taxonomy docs](https://gohugo.io/content-management/taxonomies/) for more information on naming taxonomies.

When you create a new taxonomy, you will need to adjust the navigation links on the website to point to the correct sections, which is covered below.

## Menus

Congo has two menus that can be customised to suit the content and layout of your site. The `main` menu appears in the site header and the `footer` menu appears at the bottom of the page just above the copyright notice.

Both menus are configured in the `menus.en.toml` file. Similarly to the languages config file, if you wish to use another language, rename this file and replace `en` with the language code you wish to use. Menu links will be sorted from lowest to highest `weight`, and then alphabetically by `name`.

```toml
# config/_default/menus.en.toml

[[main]]
  name = "Blog"
  pageRef = "posts"
  weight = 10

[[main]]
  name = "Topics"
  pageRef = "topics"
  weight = 20

[[main]]
  name = "GitHub"
  url = "https://github.com/jpanther/congo"
  weight = 30
  [main.params]
    icon = "github"
    showName = false
    target = "_blank"

[[main]]
  identifier = "search"
  weight = 99
  [main.params]
    action = "search"
    icon = "search"

[[footer]]
  name = "Privacy"
  pageRef = "privacy"
```

### Basic links

The `name` parameter specifies the text that is used in the menu link. You can also optionally provide a `title` which fills the HTML title attribute for the link.

The `pageRef` parameter allows you to easily reference Hugo content pages and taxonomies. It is the quickest way to configure the menu as you can simply refer to any Hugo content item and it will automatically build the correct link. To link to external URLs, the `url` parameter can be used.

Further customisation can be achieved through the use of special theme parameters. Providing `params` within a link allows the addition of an `icon`, the ability to toggle the link text with `showName` and to optionally set a `target` for the URL. In the example above, the GitHub link will only display as an icon and will open the link in a new window.

### Action links

There is a special case for creating menu items for links that take theme actions. These are denoted using the `action` parameter, and a value of the action the link should perform. Action links allow for all the same custom parameters as other links and can be styled with an icon or text name.

There are three valid theme actions:

- `appearance` will create a link to the appearance switcher
- `locale` will create a drop down picker to access translated content
- `search` will create a link to the site search

Both menus are completely optional and can be commented out if not required. Use the template provided in the default file as a guide.

## Detailed configuration

The steps above are the bare minimum configuration. If you now run `hugo server` you will be presented with a blank Congo website. Detailed configuration is covered in the [Configuration]({{< ref "configuration" >}}) section.

==================================================

{{< alert >}}

å¯¹äºCongoä¸»é¢˜çš„è®¾è®¡ï¼Œå……åˆ†åˆ©ç”¨äº†Hugoé¡µé¢æŸçš„ä¼˜åŠ¿ï¼Œäº†è§£Hugoå¸Œæœ›å†…å®¹å¦‚ä½•è¢«ç»„ç»‡æ˜¯å¾ˆé‡è¦çš„ã€‚åŠ¡å¿…é˜…è¯»[Hugoå®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£](https://gohugo.io/content-management/organization/)ä»¥è·å–æ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

### ç‰¹è‰²ã€å°é¢å’Œç¼©ç•¥å›¾å›¾ç‰‡

Congoä¸»é¢˜æ”¯æŒåœ¨æ–‡ç« åˆ—è¡¨å’Œå•ç‹¬çš„æ–‡ç« é¡µé¢é¡¶éƒ¨æ˜¾ç¤ºå›¾åƒã€‚æœ‰ä¸‰ç§ç±»å‹çš„å›¾åƒï¼Œæ¯ç§éƒ½æœ‰å…¶ç‰¹å®šçš„ç”¨é€”ï¼š`feature`ï¼ˆç‰¹è‰²ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªä¸çŸ¥é“æ€ä¹ˆç¿»è¯‘ï¼Œå¯èƒ½æ˜¯â€œä¸»å›¾â€ ï¼Ÿï¼‰ã€`cover`ï¼ˆå°é¢ï¼‰å’Œ`thumb`ï¼ˆç¼©ç•¥å›¾ï¼‰ã€‚

åœ¨ä¸‹é¢çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œä¸º`first-post`æ–‡ç« æä¾›äº†å°é¢å’Œç¼©ç•¥å›¾å›¾åƒï¼š

```shell
.
â””â”€â”€ content
    â””â”€â”€ posts
        â”œâ”€â”€ _index.md
        â””â”€â”€ first-post
            â”œâ”€â”€ cover.jpg
            â”œâ”€â”€ index.md
            â””â”€â”€ thumb.jpg
```

`thumb`å›¾åƒç”¨ä½œæ–‡ç« ç¼©ç•¥å›¾ï¼Œå°†æ˜¾ç¤ºåœ¨æ–‡ç« åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­ï¼Œè€Œ`cover`å›¾åƒå°†æ˜¾ç¤ºåœ¨å•ä¸ªæ–‡ç« é¡µé¢çš„å†…å®¹é¡¶éƒ¨ã€‚

![å¸¦æœ‰ç¼©ç•¥å›¾å›¾åƒçš„æ–‡ç« æˆªå›¾](article-screenshot.jpg "æ­¤ç¤ºä¾‹æ˜¾ç¤ºäº†å¸¦æœ‰ç¼©ç•¥å›¾å›¾åƒçš„æ–‡ç« ã€‚")

{{< alert >}}
ä¸ºäº†æä¾›æœ€å¤§æ€§èƒ½ï¼Œç¼©ç•¥å›¾å›¾åƒå°†è‡ªåŠ¨è£å‰ªå¹¶è°ƒæ•´å¤§å°ä¸º4:3çš„æ¯”ä¾‹ã€‚å°é¢å›¾åƒå°†è‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒæ•´å¤§å°ä»¥é€‚åº”å…¶å†…å®¹ï¼Œä½†å…è®¸ä»»ä½•æ¯”ä¾‹ã€‚
{{< /alert >}}

`feature`å›¾åƒæ˜¯ä¸€ç§ç‰¹æ®Šç±»å‹ï¼Œå½“å­˜åœ¨æ—¶ï¼Œå®ƒå°†ç”¨äºæ›¿ä»£`thumb`å’Œ`cover`å›¾åƒã€‚ç‰¹è‰²å›¾åƒä¹Ÿå‡ºç°åœ¨æ–‡ç« å…ƒæ•°æ®ä¸­ï¼Œåœ¨å°†å†…å®¹å…±äº«åˆ°Facebookå’ŒTwitterç­‰ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ç½‘ç»œæ—¶åŒ…å«åœ¨å…¶ä¸­ã€‚

ä¸»é¢˜å°†æ™ºèƒ½æ£€æµ‹æ–‡ç« å›¾åƒå¹¶è‡ªåŠ¨å°†å…¶æ·»åŠ åˆ°æ‚¨çš„ç«™ç‚¹ã€‚æ‚¨ä¸å¿…åœ¨æ­£æ–‡ä¸­å¼•ç”¨å®ƒä»¬ï¼Œåªéœ€å°†ä»¥é€‚å½“å‘½åçš„æ–‡ä»¶æ”¾åœ¨é¡µé¢èµ„æºä¸­å³å¯ã€‚å¦‚æœå›¾åƒæ–‡ä»¶åä¸­çš„ä»»ä½•åœ°æ–¹éƒ½åŒ…å«æœ¯è¯­`feature`ã€`cover`æˆ–`thumb`ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå®ƒå°†ç”¨äºè¯¥ç”¨é€”ã€‚

[ç¤ºä¾‹éƒ¨åˆ†]({{< ref "samples" >}})æä¾›äº†è¿™äº›å›¾åƒçš„è®¸å¤šç¤ºä¾‹ï¼ˆæ‚¨å¯ä»¥æŸ¥çœ‹[æºä»£ç ](https://github.com/jpanther/congo/tree/dev/exampleSite/content/samples)ä»¥æŸ¥çœ‹æ–‡ä»¶ç»“æ„ï¼‰ã€‚

### åˆ†ç±»æ³•

Congo åœ¨åˆ†ç±»æ–¹é¢ä¹Ÿéå¸¸çµæ´»ã€‚æœ‰äº›äººå–œæ¬¢ä½¿ç”¨æ ‡ç­¾ï¼ˆtagsï¼‰å’Œåˆ†ç±»ï¼ˆcategoriesï¼‰æ¥å¯¹å†…å®¹è¿›è¡Œåˆ†ç»„ï¼Œè€Œå…¶ä»–äººå¯èƒ½æ›´å€¾å‘äºä½¿ç”¨ä¸»é¢˜ï¼ˆtopicsï¼‰ã€‚

Hugoé»˜è®¤ä½¿ç”¨æ–‡ç« ã€æ ‡ç­¾å’Œåˆ†ç±»ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¿™ç¬¦åˆæ‚¨çš„éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè¿™å°†è¿è¡Œè‰¯å¥½ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ‚¨å¸Œæœ›è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ­¤è®¾ç½®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡åˆ›å»º`taxonomies.toml`é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶æ¥å®ç°ï¼š

```toml
# config/_default/taxonomies.toml

topic = "topics"
```

è¿™å°†ä½¿ç”¨ä¸»é¢˜æ›¿æ¢é»˜è®¤çš„æ ‡ç­¾å’Œåˆ†ç±»ã€‚æœ‰å…³åœ¨å‘½ååˆ†ç±»æ³•æ—¶çš„æ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œè¯·å‚é˜…[Hugoåˆ†ç±»æ³•æ–‡æ¡£](https://gohugo.io/content-management/taxonomies/)ã€‚

åˆ›å»ºæ–°åˆ†ç±»æ³•æ—¶ï¼Œæ‚¨å°†éœ€è¦è°ƒæ•´ç½‘ç«™ä¸Šçš„å¯¼èˆªé“¾æ¥ï¼Œä»¥æŒ‡å‘æ­£ç¡®çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œä¸‹é¢æœ‰ç›¸å…³è¯´æ˜ã€‚

## èœå•

Congoæœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªèœå•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®æ‚¨ç«™ç‚¹çš„å†…å®¹å’Œå¸ƒå±€è¿›è¡Œè‡ªå®šä¹‰ã€‚`main`èœå•æ˜¾ç¤ºåœ¨ç«™ç‚¹é¡µçœ‰ä¸­ï¼Œè€Œ`footer`èœå•æ˜¾ç¤ºåœ¨é¡µé¢åº•éƒ¨ï¼Œæ­£å¥½åœ¨ç‰ˆæƒå£°æ˜ä¸Šæ–¹ã€‚

è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªèœå•éƒ½åœ¨`menus.en.toml`æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­é…ç½®ã€‚ä¸è¯­è¨€é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ç±»ä¼¼ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ‚¨å¸Œæœ›ä½¿ç”¨å…¶ä»–è¯­è¨€ï¼Œè¯·å°†æ­¤æ–‡ä»¶é‡å‘½åå¹¶ç”¨æ‰€éœ€çš„è¯­è¨€ä»£ç æ›¿æ¢`en`ã€‚èœå•é“¾æ¥å°†æŒ‰`weight`ä»ä½åˆ°é«˜æ’åºï¼Œç„¶åæŒ‰`name`å­—æ¯é¡ºåºæ’åºã€‚

```toml
# config/_default/menus.en.toml

[[main]]
  name = "åšå®¢"
  pageRef = "posts"
  weight = 10

[[main]]
  name = "ä¸»é¢˜"
  pageRef = "topics"
  weight = 20

[[main]]
  name = "GitHub"
  url = "https://github.com/jpanther/congo"
  weight = 30
  [main.params]
    icon = "github"
    showName = false
    target = "_blank"

[[main]]
  identifier = "search"
  weight = 99
  [main.params]
    action = "search"
    icon = "search"

[[footer]]
  name = "éšç§"
  pageRef = "privacy"
```

### åŸºæœ¬é“¾æ¥

`name` å‚æ•°æŒ‡å®šäº†èœå•é“¾æ¥ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ–‡æœ¬ã€‚æ‚¨è¿˜å¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹©æä¾› `title`ï¼Œç”¨äºå¡«å……é“¾æ¥çš„ HTML title å±æ€§ã€‚

`pageRef` å‚æ•°å…è®¸æ‚¨è½»æ¾å¼•ç”¨ Hugo å†…å®¹é¡µé¢å’Œåˆ†ç±»æ³•ã€‚è¿™æ˜¯é…ç½®èœå•çš„æœ€å¿«æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ‚¨åªéœ€å¼•ç”¨ä»»ä½• Hugo å†…å®¹é¡¹ï¼Œå®ƒå°†è‡ªåŠ¨æ„å»ºæ­£ç¡®çš„é“¾æ¥ã€‚è¦é“¾æ¥åˆ°å¤–éƒ¨ URLï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ `url` å‚æ•°ã€‚

é€šè¿‡ä½¿ç”¨ç‰¹æ®Šçš„ä¸»é¢˜å‚æ•°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è¿›ä¸€æ­¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰ã€‚åœ¨é“¾æ¥ä¸­æä¾› `params` å…è®¸æ·»åŠ  `icon`ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ `showName` åˆ‡æ¢é“¾æ¥æ–‡æœ¬çš„èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œå¹¶å¯é€‰æ‹©è®¾ç½® URL çš„ `target`ã€‚åœ¨ä¸Šé¢çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ï¼ŒGitHub é“¾æ¥å°†åªæ˜¾ç¤ºä¸ºå›¾æ ‡ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨æ–°çª—å£ä¸­æ‰“å¼€é“¾æ¥ã€‚

### æ“ä½œé“¾æ¥

æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µï¼Œç”¨äºåˆ›å»ºæ‰§è¡Œä¸»é¢˜æ“ä½œçš„èœå•é¡¹ã€‚è¿™äº›é“¾æ¥é¡¹é€šè¿‡ `action` å‚æ•°è¿›è¡Œæ ‡è¯†ï¼Œè¯¥å‚æ•°æŒ‡å®šé“¾æ¥åº”æ‰§è¡Œçš„æ“ä½œã€‚æ“ä½œé“¾æ¥å…è®¸ä½¿ç”¨ä¸å…¶ä»–é“¾æ¥ï¼ˆåŸºæœ¬é“¾æ¥ï¼‰ç›¸åŒçš„è‡ªå®šä¹‰å‚æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å¯ä»¥ç”¨å›¾æ ‡æˆ–æ–‡æœ¬åç§°è¿›è¡Œæ ·å¼è®¾ç½®ã€‚

Congoå†…ç½®æœ‰ä¸‰ä¸ªæœ‰æ•ˆçš„ä¸»é¢˜æ“ä½œï¼š

- `appearance` å°†åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªæŒ‡å‘å¤–è§‚åˆ‡æ¢å™¨ï¼ˆæ·±è‰²ä¸»é¢˜è¿˜æ˜¯æµ…è‰²ä¸»é¢˜ï¼‰çš„é“¾æ¥
- `locale` å°†åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªä¸‹æ‹‰é€‰æ‹©å™¨ï¼Œä»¥åˆ‡æ¢è¯­è¨€è®¿é—®å·²ç¿»è¯‘çš„å†…å®¹
- `search` å°†åˆ›å»ºæŒ‡å‘ç«™å†…æœç´¢çš„é“¾æ¥

è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªèœå•éƒ½æ˜¯å®Œå…¨å¯é€‰çš„ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸éœ€è¦ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ³¨é‡Šæ‰ã€‚ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­æä¾›çš„æ¨¡æ¿ä½œä¸ºé…ç½®æŒ‡å—ã€‚

## æ›´è¯¦ç»†é…ç½®

ä¸Šè¿°æ­¥éª¤æ˜¯æœ€åŸºæœ¬çš„é…ç½®ã€‚å¦‚æœç°åœ¨è¿è¡Œ `hugo server`ï¼Œæ‚¨å°†çœ‹åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºç™½çš„ Congo ç½‘ç«™ã€‚æ›´è¯¦ç»†é…ç½®åœ¨ [åŸºæœ¬é…ç½®]({{< ref "configuration" >}}) éƒ¨åˆ†è¿›è¡Œä»‹ç»ã€‚
